<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Quantum Flux - Elevate Your Digital Presence</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Quantum Flux: Leading the charge in modern web development. Experience stunning design, seamless performance, and innovative solutions tailored for your success.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="web development, modern website, UI/UX, digital agency, design, responsive, black and purple theme">
    <meta name="author" content="Quantum Flux Agency">

    <!-- Google Fonts -->
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800&family=Poppins:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

    <!-- Font Awesome 6.4.0 CDN -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css" integrity="sha512-iecdLmaskl7CVkqkXNQ/ZH/XLlvWZOJyj7Yy7tcenmpD1ypASozpmT/E0iPtmFIB46ZmdtAc9eNBvH0H/ZpiBw==" crossorigin="anonymous" referrerpolicy="no-referrer" />

    <style>
        /* CSS Variables */
        :root {
            /* Colors */
            --black-base: #0A0A0A;
            --purple-dark: #2C003E;
            --purple-medium: #57007A;
            --purple-light: #8A00B8;
            --accent-pink: #E6007A;
            --text-light: #F0F0F0;
            --text-muted: #B0B0B0;
            --glass-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08); /* Lighter for contrast on dark background */
            --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
            --glass-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);

            /* Gradients */
            --gradient-primary: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--purple-light), var(--accent-pink));
            --gradient-secondary: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--purple-dark), var(--purple-medium));
            --gradient-text: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--purple-light), var(--accent-pink));

            /* Typography */
            --font-heading: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            --font-body: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            --h1-size: clamp(3rem, 7vw, 5.5rem);
            --h2-size: clamp(2.2rem, 5vw, 4rem);
            --h3-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4vw, 2.8rem);
            --body-text-size: 1.15rem;

            /* Spacing (8px grid) */
            --spacing-xs: 8px;
            --spacing-sm: 16px;
            --spacing-md: 24px;
            --spacing-lg: 48px;
            --spacing-xl: 80px;
            --spacing-xxl: 120px;

            /* Border Radius */
            --radius-sm: 8px;
            --radius-md: 16px;
            --radius-lg: 24px;

            /* Shadows */
            --shadow-sm: 0 4px 10px var(--glass-shadow);
            --shadow-md: 0 8px 20px var(--glass-shadow);
            --shadow-lg: 0 16px 40px var(--glass-shadow);
            --shadow-card-hover: 0 20px 50px var(--glass-shadow);
        }

        /* Global Styles & Reset */
        *, *::before, *::after {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
            font-size: 16px; /* Base for rem units */
        }

        body {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: var(--text-light);
            background-color: var(--black-base);
            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        a {
            color: var(--accent-pink);
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }

        a:hover {
            color: var(--purple-light);
        }

        ul {
            list-style: none;
        }

        img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            display: block;
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            line-height: 1.2;
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        h1 { font-size: var(--h1-size); font-weight: 800; }
        h2 { font-size: var(--h2-size); }
        h3 { font-size: var(--h3-size); }

        p {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            font-size: var(--body-text-size);
            color: var(--text-muted);
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 var(--spacing-md);
        }

        section {
            padding: var(--spacing-xxl) 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        /* Gradient Text Helper */
        .gradient-text {
            background: var(--gradient-text);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback for browsers that don't support text-fill-color */
            display: inline-block; /* Required for clip to work well */
        }

        /* Glassmorphism Effect */
        .glass-effect {
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
        }

        /* Buttons */
        .btn {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: var(--spacing-sm) var(--spacing-lg);
            border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            cursor: pointer;
            border: none;
            outline: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            min-width: 120px;
            min-height: 48px; /* Touch friendly */
        }

        .btn-primary {
            background: var(--gradient-primary);
            color: var(--text-light);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(230, 0, 122, 0.4);
        }

        .btn-primary:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-pink), var(--purple-light));
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(230, 0, 122, 0.6);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            color: var(--text-light);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: var(--gradient-secondary);
            border-color: transparent;
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 15px var(--glass-shadow);
        }

        /* Navigation Bar */
        .navbar {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1000;
            padding: var(--spacing-sm) 0;
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .navbar .container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .logo {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--text-light);
            background: var(--gradient-text);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent;
        }

        .nav-links {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-lg);
        }

        .nav-links a {
            color: var(--text-light);
            font-weight: 500;
            font-size: 1.05rem;
            padding: var(--spacing-xs) 0;
            position: relative;
        }

        .nav-links a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background: var(--gradient-primary);
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }

        .nav-links a:hover::after,
        .nav-links a.active::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .hamburger {
            display: none;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            color: var(--text-light);
            z-index: 1001; /* Ensure it's above the mobile menu */
            min-width: 44px;
            min-height: 44px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .mobile-menu {
            display: none;
            flex-direction: column;
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            right: -100%; /* Start off-screen */
            width: 70%;
            height: 100vh;
            background: var(--black-base);
            padding: var(--spacing-xxl) var(--spacing-md);
            box-shadow: -5px 0 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            transition: right 0.4s ease-in-out;
            z-index: 999;
            gap: var(--spacing-md);
            align-items: flex-start;
        }

        .mobile-menu.active {
            right: 0;
        }

        .mobile-menu a {
            color: var(--text-light);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            padding: var(--spacing-sm) 0;
            width: 100%;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
        }

        .mobile-menu a:last-child {
            border-bottom: none;
        }

        /* Hero Section */
        .hero {
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--black-base) 0%, var(--purple-dark) 100%);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -20%;
            left: -20%;
            width: 140%;
            height: 140%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(138, 0, 184, 0.15) 0%, transparent 60%);
            animation: pulseBackground 15s infinite alternate ease-in-out;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            max-width: 900px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .hero h1 {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            text-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
        }

        .hero p {
            font-size: clamp(1.2rem, 2.5vw, 1.6rem);
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
            max-width: 700px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
            color: var(--text-muted);
        }

        .hero .cta-buttons {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: var(--spacing-md);
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        /* Features Section */
        .features {
            background-color: var(--black-base);
            text-align: center;
        }

        .features h2 {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .features-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--spacing-lg);
        }

        .feature-card {
            padding: var(--spacing-lg);
            text-align: center;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }

        .feature-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 0%, var(--purple-light) 0%, transparent 30%);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
            z-index: -1;
        }

        .feature-card:hover::before {
            opacity: 0.1;
        }

        .feature-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-card-hover);
        }

        .feature-card .icon {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            background: var(--gradient-primary);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent;
        }

        .feature-card h3 {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .feature-card p {
            color: var(--text-muted);
            font-size: 1rem;
        }

        /* About Section */
        .about {
            background-color: var(--purple-dark);
        }

        .about-content {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            align-items: center;
        }

        .about-image {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 300px;
            position: relative;
        }

        .about-image img {
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
            transform: rotate(-3deg);
            transition: transform 0.5s ease;
        }

        .about-image img:hover {
            transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1.02);
        }

        .about-text {
            flex: 1.2;
            padding: var(--spacing-md);
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }

        .about-text h2 {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .about-text p {
            font-size: 1.05rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
        }

        /* Testimonials Section */
        .testimonials {
            background-color: var(--black-base);
            text-align: center;
        }

        .testimonials h2 {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .testimonial-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--spacing-lg);
        }

        .testimonial-card {
            padding: var(--spacing-lg);
            text-align: left;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .testimonial-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-card-hover);
        }

        .testimonial-card .quote {
            font-size: 1.15rem;
            font-style: italic;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .testimonial-author {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: var(--spacing-sm);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .testimonial-author img {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            border: 2px solid var(--accent-pink);
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(230, 0, 122, 0.5);
        }

        .author-info strong {
            display: block;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .author-info span {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
        }

        /* Contact Section */
        .contact {
            background-color: var(--purple-dark);
            text-align: center;
        }

        .contact h2 {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .contact-form {
            max-width: 700px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: var(--spacing-xl);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
        }

        .form-group {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            text-align: left;
        }

        .form-group label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
            font-weight: 500;
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .form-group input,
        .form-group textarea {
            width: 100%;
            padding: var(--spacing-sm) var(--spacing-md);
            border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            color: var(--text-light);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 1rem;
            transition: border-color 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .form-group input:focus,
        .form-group textarea:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: var(--accent-pink);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(230, 0, 122, 0.3);
        }

        .form-group textarea {
            resize: vertical;
            min-height: 120px;
        }

        .contact-form .btn-primary {
            width: 100%;
            padding: var(--spacing-md) var(--spacing-lg);
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-top: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        /* Footer */
        .footer {
            background-color: var(--black-base);
            color: var(--text-muted);
            padding: var(--spacing-xxl) 0 var(--spacing-lg);
            text-align: center;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--purple-dark);
        }

        .footer .container {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: space-between;
            text-align: left;
        }

        .footer-col {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 200px;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
            padding: 0 var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .footer-col h3 {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .footer-col ul li {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
        }

        .footer-col ul li a {
            color: var(--text-muted);
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }

        .footer-col ul li a:hover {
            color: var(--accent-pink);
        }

        .social-links {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-sm);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .social-links a {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
            transition: color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
            min-width: 44px;
            min-height: 44px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .social-links a:hover {
            color: var(--accent-pink);
            transform: translateY(-3px);
        }

        .footer-bottom {
            margin-top: var(--spacing-xl);
            padding-top: var(--spacing-md);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--purple-dark);
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            text-align: center;
            width: 100%;
        }

        /* Scroll Animations */
        .animate-on-scroll {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(50px);
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out;
        }

        .animate-on-scroll.is-visible {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        /* Keyframe Animations */
        @keyframes pulseBackground {
            0% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.15; }
            50% { transform: scale(1.1); opacity: 0.25; }
            100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.15; }
        }

        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .navbar .nav-links {
                gap: var(--spacing-md);
            }

            .hero h1 {
                font-size: clamp(2.8rem, 6vw, 4.5rem);

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta name="description" content="Unlock your potential with Catalyst, the leading SaaS platform designed to streamline workflows and boost productivity.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="SaaS, productivity, workflow, automation, business, software, management">
    <meta name="author" content="Catalyst Team">
    <title>Catalyst - Elevate Your Workflow</title>

    <!-- Google Fonts -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800&family=Poppins:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <!-- Font Awesome 6.4.0 -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">

    <style>
        /* CSS Variables */
        :root {
            --color-primary: #6366f1; /* Indigo 500 */
            --color-secondary: #d946ef; /* Fuchsia 500 */
            --color-accent: #fb7185; /* Rose 500 */
            --color-text-light: #e2e8f0; /* Slate 200 */
            --color-text-dark: #1e293b; /* Slate 900 */
            --color-bg-dark: #0f172a; /* Slate 900 */
            --color-bg-dark-light: #1e293b; /* Slate 800 */
            --color-card-bg: rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.6); /* Slate 800 semi-transparent */
            --color-glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.18);

            --gradient-primary: linear-gradient(to right, var(--color-primary), var(--color-secondary));
            --gradient-accent: linear-gradient(to right, var(--color-accent), #f43f5e); /* Rose to Red */
            --gradient-blue: linear-gradient(to right, #3b82f6, #0ea5e9); /* Blue to Sky */

            --spacing-xs: 8px;
            --spacing-sm: 16px;
            --spacing-md: 24px;
            --spacing-lg: 32px;
            --spacing-xl: 48px;
            --spacing-2xl: 64px;
            --spacing-3xl: 96px;
            --spacing-4xl: 128px;

            --radius-sm: 12px;
            --radius-md: 16px;
            --radius-lg: 24px;

            --shadow-sm: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
            --shadow-md: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            --shadow-lg: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            --shadow-premium:
                0 0px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1),
                0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
                0 15px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
        }

        /* Base Styles & Reset */
        *, *::before, *::after {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            background-color: var(--color-bg-dark);
            overflow-x: hidden; /* Prevent horizontal scroll due to animations */
        }

        a {
            color: inherit;
            text-decoration: none;
        }

        img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            display: block;
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
            font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.2;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }

        /* Utility Classes */
        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .section-padding {
            padding: var(--spacing-4xl) 0;
        }

        .text-center {
            text-align: center;
        }

        .text-gradient {
            background-image: var(--gradient-primary);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback for browsers that don't support -webkit-text-fill-color */
        }

        .btn {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: var(--spacing-sm) var(--spacing-lg);
            border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            min-height: 44px; /* Touch-friendly */
            min-width: 44px; /* Touch-friendly */
            border: none;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .btn-primary {
            background-image: var(--gradient-primary);
            color: white;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        .btn-primary::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background-image: var(--gradient-accent);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
            z-index: -1;
        }
        .btn-primary:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        .btn-primary:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background-color: transparent;
            border: 1px solid var(--color-primary);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
        }
        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background-color: rgba(var(--color-primary), 0.1);
            border-color: var(--color-secondary);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }

        .btn-icon {
            margin-left: var(--spacing-xs);
        }

        .card {
            background-color: var(--color-card-bg);
            border: 1px solid var(--color-glass-border);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            padding: var(--spacing-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
        }

        /* Scroll Animations (using data-aos-effect) */
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in"] {
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in"].aos-animate {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-up"] {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(20px);
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-up"].aos-animate {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-left"] {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateX(-20px);
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-left"].aos-animate {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateX(0);
        }

        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-right"] {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateX(20px);
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-right"].aos-animate {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateX(0);
        }

        /* Navigation */
        .navbar {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1000;
            padding: var(--spacing-md) 0;
            background-color: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.7); /* Darker semi-transparent */
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-glass-border);
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease, border-bottom 0.3s ease;
        }

        .navbar .container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .navbar-brand {
            font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }
        .navbar-brand i {
            margin-right: var(--spacing-xs);
            color: var(--color-secondary);
        }

        .nav-menu {
            display: flex;
            list-style: none;
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
        }

        .nav-item a {
            font-weight: 500;
            padding: var(--spacing-xs) 0;
            position: relative;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }
        .nav-item a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background-image: var(--gradient-primary);
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }
        .nav-item a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary);
        }
        .nav-item a:hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .hamburger {
            display: none;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            z-index: 1001;
            min-height: 44px;
            min-width: 44px;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        /* Mobile Nav Menu */
        .mobile-nav-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background-color: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.95);
            backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            transform: translateX(100%);
            transition: transform 0.4s ease-in-out;
            z-index: 999;
        }
        .mobile-nav-overlay.active {
            transform: translateX(0);
        }
        .mobile-nav-overlay .nav-menu {
            flex-direction: column;
            text-align: center;
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
        }
        .mobile-nav-overlay .nav-item a {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        .mobile-nav-overlay .nav-item a::after {
            height: 3px;
        }

        /* Hero Section */
        .hero {
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            background-color: var(--color-bg-dark);
            background-image: radial-gradient(at 27% 37%, hsla(271,70%,50%,0.2) 0px, transparent 50%),
                              radial-gradient(at 97% 20%, hsla(339,70%,50%,0.2) 0px, transparent 50%),
                              radial-gradient(at 10% 70%, hsla(200,70%,50%,0.15) 0px, transparent 50%),
                              radial-gradient(at 90% 90%, hsla(280,70%,50%,0.1) 0px, transparent 50%);
        }

        .hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.08) 0%, transparent 70%);
            animation: rotateBackground 20s linear infinite;
            z-index: 0;
        }

        @keyframes rotateBackground {
            from { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }

        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            max-width: 800px;
            padding: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 4.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 400;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            max-width: 600px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }

        .hero-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-md);
            justify-content: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        /* Features Section */
        .features-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-3xl);
        }

        .feature-card {
            text-align: center;
            padding: var(--spacing-lg) var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .feature-card i {
            font-size: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            background-image: var(--gradient-blue);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback */
        }

        .feature-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.75rem;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .feature-card p {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }

        /* Pricing Section */
        .pricing-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-3xl);
        }

        .pricing-card {
            padding: var(--spacing-lg) var(--spacing-xl);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg); /* Larger radius for pricing cards */
            text-align: center;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .pricing-card.highlight {
            border: 2px solid;
            border-image: var(--gradient-primary);
            border-image-slice: 1;
            background-color: rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8); /* Slightly less transparent */
            transform: translateY(-10px) scale(1.05); /* More prominent lift */
        }
        .pricing-card.highlight .btn-primary {
            background-image: var(--gradient-accent);
        }
        .pricing-card.highlight .btn-primary::before {
            background-image: var(--gradient-blue);
        }


        .pricing-card h3 {
            font-size: 2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
        }

        .pricing-card .price {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
        }
        .pricing-card .price span {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            align-self: flex-start;
            margin-top: var(--spacing-xs);
            margin-right: var(--spacing-xs);
        }
        .pricing-card .price small {
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 400;
            align-self: flex-end;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
            margin-left: var(--spacing-xs);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }

        .pricing-card ul {
            list-style: none;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            flex-grow: 1;
        }
        .pricing-card ul li {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }
        .pricing-card ul li i {
            color: #22c55e; /* Green 500 */
            margin-right: var(--spacing-sm);
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .pricing-card .btn {
            width: 100%;
            padding: var(--spacing-md) var(--spacing-lg);
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
        }

        /* Call to Action Section */
        .cta-section {
            background-image: var(--gradient-blue);
            padding: var(--spacing-4xl) 0;
            text-align: center;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            margin: var(--spacing-4xl) var(--spacing-md);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
        }

        .cta-section h2 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            color: white;
        }

        .cta-section p {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin: 0 auto var(--spacing-xl) auto;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
        }

        .cta-section .btn {
            background-color: white;
            color: var(--color-bg-dark);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
        }
        .cta-section .btn:hover {
            background-color: var(--color-text-light);
            transform: translateY(-3px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }

        /* Footer */
        .footer {
            background-color: var(--color-bg-dark-light);
            padding: var(--spacing-4xl) 0 var(--spacing-lg) 0;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        .footer .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            padding-bottom: var(--spacing-3xl);
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
        }

        .footer-col h4 {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }

        .footer-col ul {
            list-style: none;
        }
        .footer-col ul li {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
        }
        .footer-col ul li a {
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }
        .footer-col ul li a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary);
        }

        .footer-brand {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }
        .footer-brand i {
            margin-right: var(--spacing-xs);
            color: var(--color-secondary);
        }

        .social-icons {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-md);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-md);
        }
        .social-icons a {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            transition: color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary);
            transform: translateY(-3px);
        }

        .footer-bottom {
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
        }

        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .navbar .nav-menu {
                gap: var(--spacing-lg);
            }
            .features-grid, .pricing-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
            .footer .container {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 3.5rem;
            }
            .hero p {
                font-size: 1.25rem;
            }
            .pricing-card.highlight {
                transform: none; /* Remove extra lift on smaller screens */
            }
            .cta-section h2 {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .navbar .nav-menu {
                display: none;
            }
            .hamburger {
                display: flex;
            }
            .hero {
                height: auto;
                padding: 150px var(--spacing-md) var(--spacing-4xl) var(--spacing-md);
            }
            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 3rem;
            }
            .hero p {
                font-size: 1rem;
            }
            .hero-actions {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
            .btn {
                width: 100%;
            }
            .features-grid, .pricing-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            .footer .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                text-align: center;
            }
            .footer-col {
                margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            }
            .footer-col:last-child {
                margin-bottom: 0;
            }
            .footer-brand, .social-icons {
                justify-content: center;
            }
            .cta-section h2 {
                font-size: 2rem;
            }
            .cta-section p {
                font-size: 1rem;
            }
            .section-padding {
                padding: var(--spacing-3xl) 0;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }
            .hero p {
                font-size: 0.9rem;
            }
            .navbar-brand {
                font-size: 1.5rem;
            }
            .feature-card h3 {
                font-size: 1.5rem;
            }
            .pricing-card h3 {
                font-size: 1.75rem;
            }
            .pricing-card .price {
                font-size: 3rem;
            }
            .pricing-card .price span {
                font-size: 1.2rem;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>

            background-image: var(--gradient-primary);
            color: white;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        .btn-primary::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background-image: var(--gradient-accent);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
            z-index: -1;
        }
        .btn-primary:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
        }
        .btn-primary:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background-color: transparent;
            border: 1px solid var(--color-primary);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
        }
        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background-color: rgba(var(--color-primary), 0.1);
            border-color: var(--color-secondary);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }

        .btn-icon {
            margin-left: var(--spacing-xs);
        }

        .card {
            background-color: var(--color-card-bg);
            border: 1px solid var(--color-glass-border);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            padding: var(--spacing-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
        }

        /* Scroll Animations (using data-aos-effect) */
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in"] {
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in"].aos-animate {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-up"] {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(20px);
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-up"].aos-animate {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-left"] {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateX(-20px);
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-left"].aos-animate {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateX(0);
        }

        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-right"] {
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateX(20px);
            transition: opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        [data-aos-effect="fade-in-right"].aos-animate {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateX(0);
        }

        /* Navigation */
        .navbar {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1000;
            padding: var(--spacing-md) 0;
            background-color: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.7); /* Darker semi-transparent */
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-glass-border);
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease, border-bottom 0.3s ease;
        }

        .navbar .container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .navbar-brand {
            font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }
        .navbar-brand i {
            margin-right: var(--spacing-xs);
            color: var(--color-secondary);
        }

        .nav-menu {
            display: flex;
            list-style: none;
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
        }

        .nav-item a {
            font-weight: 500;
            padding: var(--spacing-xs) 0;
            position: relative;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }
        .nav-item a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background-image: var(--gradient-primary);
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }
        .nav-item a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary);
        }
        .nav-item a:hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .hamburger {
            display: none;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            z-index: 1001;
            min-height: 44px;
            min-width: 44px;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        /* Mobile Nav Menu */
        .mobile-nav-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background-color: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.95);
            backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            transform: translateX(100%);
            transition: transform 0.4s ease-in-out;
            z-index: 999;
        }
        .mobile-nav-overlay.active {
            transform: translateX(0);
        }
        .mobile-nav-overlay .nav-menu {
            flex-direction: column;
            text-align: center;
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
        }
        .mobile-nav-overlay .nav-item a {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        .mobile-nav-overlay .nav-item a::after {
            height: 3px;
        }

        /* Hero Section */
        .hero {
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            background-color: var(--color-bg-dark);
            background-image: radial-gradient(at 27% 37%, hsla(271,70%,50%,0.2) 0px, transparent 50%),
                              radial-gradient(at 97% 20%, hsla(339,70%,50%,0.2) 0px, transparent 50%),
                              radial-gradient(at 10% 70%, hsla(200,70%,50%,0.15) 0px, transparent 50%),
                              radial-gradient(at 90% 90%, hsla(280,70%,50%,0.1) 0px, transparent 50%);
        }

        .hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.08) 0%, transparent 70%);
            animation: rotateBackground 20s linear infinite;
            z-index: 0;
        }

        @keyframes rotateBackground {
            from { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }

        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            max-width: 800px;
            padding: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .hero h1 {
            font-size: 4.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 400;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            max-width: 600px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }

        .hero-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-md);
            justify-content: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        /* Features Section */
        .features-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-3xl);
        }

        .feature-card {
            text-align: center;
            padding: var(--spacing-lg) var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .feature-card i {
            font-size: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            background-image: var(--gradient-blue);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback */
        }

        .feature-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.75rem;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .feature-card p {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }

        /* Pricing Section */
        .pricing-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-3xl);
        }

        .pricing-card {
            padding: var(--spacing-lg) var(--spacing-xl);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg); /* Larger radius for pricing cards */
            text-align: center;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .pricing-card.highlight {
            border: 2px solid;
            border-image: var(--gradient-primary);
            border-image-slice: 1;
            background-color: rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8); /* Slightly less transparent */
            transform: translateY(-10px) scale(1.05); /* More prominent lift */
        }
        .pricing-card.highlight .btn-primary {
            background-image: var(--gradient-accent);
        }
        .pricing-card.highlight .btn-primary::before {
            background-image: var(--gradient-blue);
        }


        .pricing-card h3 {
            font-size: 2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
        }

        .pricing-card .price {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
        }
        .pricing-card .price span {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            align-self: flex-start;
            margin-top: var(--spacing-xs);
            margin-right: var(--spacing-xs);
        }
        .pricing-card .price small {
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 400;
            align-self: flex-end;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
            margin-left: var(--spacing-xs);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }

        .pricing-card ul {
            list-style: none;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            flex-grow: 1;
        }
        .pricing-card ul li {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }
        .pricing-card ul li i {
            color: #22c55e; /* Green 500 */
            margin-right: var(--spacing-sm);
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .pricing-card .btn {
            width: 100%;
            padding: var(--spacing-md) var(--spacing-lg);
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
        }

        /* Call to Action Section */
        .cta-section {
            background-image: var(--gradient-blue);
            padding: var(--spacing-4xl) 0;
            text-align: center;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            margin: var(--spacing-4xl) var(--spacing-md);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
        }

        .cta-section h2 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            color: white;
        }

        .cta-section p {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin: 0 auto var(--spacing-xl) auto;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
        }

        .cta-section .btn {
            background-color: white;
            color: var(--color-bg-dark);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
        }
        .cta-section .btn:hover {
            background-color: var(--color-text-light);
            transform: translateY(-3px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }

        /* Footer */
        .footer {
            background-color: var(--color-bg-dark-light);
            padding: var(--spacing-4xl) 0 var(--spacing-lg) 0;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        .footer .container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            padding-bottom: var(--spacing-3xl);
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
        }

        .footer-col h4 {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }

        .footer-col ul {
            list-style: none;
        }
        .footer-col ul li {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
        }
        .footer-col ul li a {
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }
        .footer-col ul li a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary);
        }

        .footer-brand {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }
        .footer-brand i {
            margin-right: var(--spacing-xs);
            color: var(--color-secondary);
        }

        .social-icons {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-md);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-md);
        }
        .social-icons a {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            transition: color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
        }
        .social-icons a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary);
            transform: translateY(-3px);
        }

        .footer-bottom {
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
        }

        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .navbar .nav-menu {
                gap: var(--spacing-lg);
            }
            .features-grid, .pricing-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
            .footer .container {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 3.5rem;
            }
            .hero p {
                font-size: 1.25rem;
            }
            .pricing-card.highlight {
                transform: none; /* Remove extra lift on smaller screens */
            }
            .cta-section h2 {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .navbar .nav-menu {
                display: none;
            }
            .hamburger {
                display: flex;
            }
            .hero {
                height: auto;
                padding: 150px var(--spacing-md) var(--spacing-4xl) var(--spacing-md);
            }
            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 3rem;
            }
            .hero p {
                font-size: 1rem;
            }
            .hero-actions {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
            .btn {
                width: 100%;
            }
            .features-grid, .pricing-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            .footer .container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                text-align: center;
            }
            .footer-col {
                margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            }
            .footer-col:last-child {
                margin-bottom: 0;
            }
            .footer-brand, .social-icons {
                justify-content: center;
            }
            .cta-section h2 {
                font-size: 2rem;
            }
            .cta-section p {
                font-size: 1rem;
            }
            .section-padding {
                padding: var(--spacing-3xl) 0;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }
            .hero p {
                font-size: 0.9rem;
            }
            .navbar-brand {
                font-size: 1.5rem;
            }
            .feature-card h3 {
                font-size: 1.5rem;
            }
            .pricing-card h3 {
                font-size: 1.75rem;
            }
            .pricing-card .price {
                font-size: 3rem;
            }
            .pricing-card .price span {
                font-size: 1.2rem;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>NexGen SaaS - Revolutionize Your Workflow</title>
    <meta name="description" content="NexGen SaaS offers cutting-edge solutions to streamline your business operations, boost productivity, and drive innovation. Experience the future of work.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="SaaS, productivity, business, software, automation, workflow, innovation, cloud, modern">
    <meta name="author" content="Elite Web Developer">

    <!-- Google Fonts -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800&family=Poppins:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <!-- Font Awesome 6.4.0 CDN -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css" integrity="sha512-iecdLmaskl7CVkqkXNQ/ZH/XLlvWZOJyj7Yy7tcenmpD1ypASozpmT/E0iPtmFIB46ZmdgNsGaKXrX+uBGf/BdYQ==" crossorigin="anonymous" referrerpolicy="no-referrer" />

    <style>
        /* CSS Variables */
        :root {
            --color-primary-start: #6366F1; /* Indigo */
            --color-primary-end: #D946EF; /* Fuchsia */
            --color-secondary-start: #06B6D4; /* Cyan */
            --color-secondary-end: #3B82F6; /* Blue */
            --color-accent-start: #F97316; /* Orange */
            --color-accent-end: #EF4444; /* Red */
            --color-cta-text: #ffffff;

            --bg-dark: #0A0A10; /* Very dark almost black */
            --bg-light: #F8FAFC; /* Light gray */
            --text-light: #E2E8F0; /* Light text on dark bg */
            --text-dark: #1F2937; /* Dark text on light bg */
            --border-color-light: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            --border-color-dark: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

            --glass-bg-light: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
            --glass-bg-dark: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            --glass-blur: 12px;

            --shadow-sm: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
            --shadow-md: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            --shadow-lg: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            --shadow-premium: 0px 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0px 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0px 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

            --radius-sm: 12px;
            --radius-md: 16px;
            --radius-lg: 24px;

            --spacing-unit: 8px; /* 8px grid system */

            --font-heading: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            --font-body: 'Inter', sans-serif;
        }

        /* Base Reset & Typography */
        *, *::before, *::after {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
            font-size: 16px; /* Base for rem units */
        }

        body {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: var(--text-light);
            background-color: var(--bg-dark);
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-weight: 700;
            line-height: 1.2;
            color: var(--text-light);
            margin-bottom: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 2);
        }

        h1 { font-size: clamp(3rem, 7vw, 5.5rem); font-weight: 800; }
        h2 { font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 4rem); font-weight: 800; }
        h3 { font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4vw, 2.8rem); font-weight: 700; }
        p { margin-bottom: var(--spacing-unit) * 2; }

        a {
            color: var(--color-primary-end);
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }
        a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary-end);
        }

        img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            display: block;
        }

        /* Utility Classes */
        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 4);
        }

        .text-center { text-align: center; }
        .text-gradient {
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--color-primary-start), var(--color-primary-end));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback for browsers that don't support text-fill-color */
        }
        .text-gradient-secondary {
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--color-secondary-start), var(--color-secondary-end));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback */
        }

        /* Buttons */
        .btn {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 2.5) calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 5);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            border: none;
            outline: none;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
            min-width: 44px; /* Touch-friendly */
            min-height: 44px; /* Touch-friendly */
            text-decoration: none;
            color: var(--color-cta-text);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }

        .btn-primary {
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--color-primary-start), var(--color-primary-end));
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(100, 50, 200, 0.4);
        }
        .btn-primary:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(100, 50, 200, 0.6);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--color-secondary-start), var(--color-secondary-end));
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(50, 150, 200, 0.4);
        }
        .btn-secondary:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(50, 150, 200, 0.6);
        }

        .btn-outline {
            background: transparent;
            border: 2px solid var(--color-primary-end);
            color: var(--color-primary-end);
            padding: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 2.5 - 2px) calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 5 - 2px);
            box-shadow: none;
        }
        .btn-outline:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--color-primary-start), var(--color-primary-end));
            color: var(--color-cta-text);
            border-color: transparent;
            transform: translateY(-3px) scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(100, 50, 200, 0.4);
        }

        /* Sections */
        section {
            padding: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 10) 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        /* Navigation */
        .navbar {
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1000;
            background-color: var(--glass-bg-light);
            backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-blur));
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color-light);
            padding: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 2) calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 4);
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
        }

        .navbar-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .logo {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--text-light);
            text-decoration: none;
        }
        .logo .icon {
            margin-right: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 1);
            color: var(--color-primary-end);
        }

        .nav-links {
            display: flex;
            list-style: none;
            gap: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 4);
        }

        .nav-links a {
            color: var(--text-light);
            font-weight: 500;
            position: relative;
            padding: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 1) 0;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }
        .nav-links a:hover {
            color: var(--color-primary-end);
        }
        .nav-links a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--color-primary-start), var(--color-primary-end));
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }
        .nav-links a:hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .hamburger {
            display: none;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            color: var(--text-light);
            cursor: pointer;
            z-index: 1001;
        }

        /* Hero Section */
        .hero {
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bg-dark) 0%, #1a0f2e 50%, var(--bg-dark) 100%);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            padding: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 4);
        }

        .hero-content {
            max-width: 900px;
            z-index: 10;
        }

        .hero h1 {
            margin-bottom: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 4);
            font-size: clamp(3.5rem, 8vw, 6rem); /* Even larger for hero */
            line-height: 1.1;
        }

        .hero p {
            font-size: 1.4rem;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin: 0 auto calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 6);
            color: var(--text-light);
            font-weight: 300;
        }

        .hero-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 4);
            justify-content: center;
        }

        /* Background animation for Hero */
        .hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 80%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3) 0%, transparent 40%),
                        radial-gradient(circle at 80% 20%, rgba(217, 70, 239, 0.3) 0%, transparent 40%);
            animation: moveBackground 20s infinite alternate ease-in-out;
            opacity: 0.6;
        }

        @keyframes moveBackground {
            0% { transform: translate(0, 0); }
            100% { transform: translate(10%, 10%); }
        }

        /* Features Section */
        .features {
            background-color: var(--bg-dark);
        }

        .features-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 6);
            margin-top: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 8);
        }

        .feature-card {
            background: var(--glass-bg-light);
            backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-blur) / 2);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color-light);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            padding: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 5);
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: transform 0.4s ease, box-shadow 0.4s ease;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            min-height: 280px;
        }

        .feature-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            left: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at var(--x, 50%) var(--y, 50%), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) 0%, transparent 70%);
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .feature-card:hover::before {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        .feature-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px) scale(1.03);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), 0 15px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }

        .feature-card .icon {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            color: var(--color-primary-end);
            margin-bottom: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 4);
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--color-primary-start), var(--color-primary-end));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
        }

        .feature-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            margin-bottom: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 2);
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .feature-card p {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--text-light);
            opacity: 0.8;
            flex-grow: 1;
        }

        /* About Section */
        .about {
            background-color: var(--bg-dark);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color-light);
        }

        .about-content {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 8);
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .about-text, .about-image {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 300px;
        }

        .about-image img {
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: transform 0.4s ease, box-shadow 0.4s ease;
        }
        .about-image img:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 50px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), 0 15px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }

        .about-text h2 {
            margin-bottom: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 4);
        }

        .about-text p {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 3);
            color: var(--text-light);
            opacity: 0.9;
        }

        /* Testimonials Section */
        .testimonials {
            background-color: var(--bg-dark);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color-light);
        }

        .testimonials-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));

        .testimonial-card {

        .testimonial-card p {

        .testimonial-author {

        .author-info span {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: var(--text-light);

        }

        /* Pricing Section */
        .pricing {
            background-color: var(--bg-dark);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color-light);
        }

        .pricing-grid {
            display: grid;

            gap: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 6);
            margin-top: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 8);

        .pricing-card {
            background: var(--glass-bg-light);
            backdrop-filter: blur(var(--glass-blur) / 2);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color-light);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);

            display: flex;

            min-height: 500px;
        }
        .pricing-card:hover {

            border-color: var(--color-primary-end);
        }

        .pricing-card.popular {
            border-color: var(--color-primary-end);

            z-index: 10;
        }
        .pricing-card.popular:hover {
            transform: translateY(-12px) scale(1.08); /* Even more lift */
        }

        .pricing-card .badge {
            display: inline-block;

            font-size: 2.2rem;
            margin-bottom: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 2);
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .pricing-card .price {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 3);
            color: var(--text-light);
            line-height: 1;
        }
        .pricing-card .price span {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            opacity: 0.7;
        }

        .pricing-card ul {

        .pricing-card ul li {

            margin-bottom: calc(var(--spacing-unit) * 2);
            color: var(--text-light);
            opacity: 0.9;
            display: flex;

        .pricing-card ul li .fa-check {

        }

        .pricing-card .btn {

            margin-top: auto; /* Push button to bottom */
        }

        /* Contact Section */

            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color-light);
            text-align: center;

            --border-color-dark: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

            --glass-bg-light: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
            --glass-bg-dark: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            --glass-blur: 12px;

            --shadow-sm: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
            --shadow-md: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            --shadow-lg: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            --shadow-premium: 0px 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0px 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0px 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

            --radius-sm: 12px;
            --radius-md: 16px;
            --radius-lg: 24px;

            --spacing-unit: 8px; /* 8px grid system */

            --font-heading: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            --font-body: 'Inter', sans-serif;
        }

        /* Base Reset & Typography */
        *, *::before, *::after {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
            font-size: 16px; /* Base for rem units */
        }

        body {

            line-height: 1.6;

        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
