websiteContent.index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Ascendance Foundry - Next-Gen Solutions</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Ascendance Foundry empowers enterprises with cutting-edge technology and strategic innovation in AI, Cloud, and Cybersecurity.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="Ascendance Foundry, AI, Machine Learning, Cloud Infrastructure, Cybersecurity, Data Analytics, DevOps, Blockchain, Web3, enterprise solutions, technology, innovation">
    <meta name="author" content="Ascendance Foundry">

    <!-- Google Fonts -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800&family=Poppins:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap">
    <!-- Font Awesome -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <style>
        /* CSS Variables - Modern Design System */
        :root {
            /* Colors */
            --color-primary-start: #8E2DE2; /* Vibrant Purple */
            --color-primary-end: #4A00E0;   /* Deep Violet */
            --color-secondary-start: #FC466B; /* Bright Pink */
            --color-secondary-end: #3F5EFB;   /* Electric Blue */
            --color-accent-start: #FFC371;  /* Warm Orange */
            --color-accent-end: #FF5F6D;    /* Fiery Red */

            --color-bg-dark: #1A1A2E; /* Deep Background */
            --color-bg-medium: #2C2C4A; /* Section/Card Background */
            --color-bg-light: #3E3E6A; /* Lighter Dark for contrast elements */
            --color-text-light: #E0E0E0; /* Main text color */
            --color-text-muted: #A0A0B0; /* Subtext/secondary info */
            --color-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); /* Subtle border for glassmorphism */

            --color-glass-bg: rgba(44, 44, 74, 0.3); /* Semi-transparent for glassmorphism */

            /* Gradients */
            --gradient-primary: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--color-primary-start), var(--color-primary-end));
            --gradient-secondary: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--color-secondary-start), var(--color-secondary-end));
            --gradient-accent: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--color-accent-start), var(--color-accent-end));

            /* Typography */
            --font-heading: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            --font-body: 'Inter', sans-serif;

            --h1-size: clamp(3rem, 7vw, 5rem); /* Large headlines */
            --h2-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 4rem);
            --h3-size: clamp(1.8rem, 3.5vw, 2.5rem);
            --body-text-size: 1.15rem; /* Clean body text */

            /* Spacing (8px grid system) */
            --spacing-xxs: 4px;
            --spacing-xs: 8px;
            --spacing-sm: 16px;
            --spacing-md: 24px;
            --spacing-lg: 32px;
            --spacing-xl: 48px;
            --spacing-xxl: 64px;
            --section-padding: 80px 0; /* Generous white space */
            --container-padding-x: 24px;

            /* Border Radius */
            --border-radius-sm: 8px;
            --border-radius-md: 16px;
            --border-radius-lg: 24px;

            /* Premium Shadows and Depth */
            --shadow-premium: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), 0 0 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
            --shadow-hover: 0 15px 45px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4), 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);

            /* Smooth Transitions */
            --transition-speed: 0.3s ease-out;
        }

        /* Base Styles */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }

        body {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            background-color: var(--color-bg-dark);
            overflow-x: hidden; /* Prevent horizontal scroll from animations */
        }

        a {
            color: var(--color-primary-start);
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: color var(--transition-speed);
        }

        a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary-start);
        }

        ul {
            list-style: none;
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            line-height: 1.2;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        h1 { font-size: var(--h1-size); font-weight: 800;}
        h2 { font-size: var(--h2-size); font-weight: 800;}
        h3 { font-size: var(--h3-size); font-weight: 700;}

        p {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            font-size: var(--body-text-size);
            color: var(--color-text-muted);
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 var(--container-padding-x);
        }

        /* Smooth Scroll Animations (fade in, slide up/left/right) */
        .section {
            padding: var(--section-padding);
            position: relative;
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(20px);
            transition: opacity 0.6s ease-out, transform 0.6s ease-out;
        }

        .section.reveal {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .section-title {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            font-size: var(--h2-size);
            background: var(--gradient-primary); /* Vibrant gradient for headlines */
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback for browsers not supporting background-clip: text */
            font-weight: 800;
        }

        .section-subtitle {
            text-align: center;
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto var(--spacing-xl);
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            color: var(--color-text-muted);
        }

        /* Large, prominent buttons with gradients and hover effects */
        .btn {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 14px 28px;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            border: none;
            outline: none;
            transition: all var(--transition-speed);
            min-width: 120px; /* Touch-friendly buttons */
            min-height: 44px;
            text-align: center;
            text-decoration: none;
        }

        .btn-gradient {
            background: var(--gradient-secondary); /* Dynamic gradient */
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium); /* Premium shadows */
        }

        .btn-gradient:hover {
            transform: translateY(-3px); /* Lift animation */
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
            opacity: 0.9;
        }

        .btn-outline {
            background: transparent;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            border: 2px solid var(--color-primary-start);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
        }

        .btn-outline:hover {
            background: var(--color-primary-start);
            border-color: var(--color-primary-start);
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .btn-large {
            padding: 16px 32px;
            font-size: 1.15rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
        }

        /* Modern cards with hover animations */
        .card {
            background-color: var(--color-glass-bg); /* Glassmorphism effect */
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px); /* Safari support */
            border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
            padding: var(--spacing-xl);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.02); /* Lift and scale animation */
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        /* Glassmorphism navigation bar (sticky, blurred background) */
        .navbar {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1000;
            background-color: var(--color-glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border);
            padding: var(--spacing-sm) 0;
            transition: background-color var(--transition-speed), border-bottom var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .navbar .container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .navbar .logo {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            background: var(--gradient-primary);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback */
        }

        .nav-menu {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-lg);
            align-items: center;
        }

        .nav-menu a {
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            font-weight: 500;
            position: relative;
            padding: var(--spacing-xs) 0;
        }

        .nav-menu a:not(.btn)::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background: var(--gradient-secondary);
            transition: width var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .nav-menu a:not(.btn):hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        /* Hamburger menu for mobile */
        .hamburger {
            display: none;
            background: none;
            border: none;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: var(--spacing-xs);
            min-width: 44px; /* Touch-friendly */
            min-height: 44px;
            z-index: 1001;
        }

        /* Hero section: Full viewport height with compelling headline */
        .hero {
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            background: url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1554971672-091448c99a35?w=1600&h=900&fit=crop&q=80') no-repeat center center/cover;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(26, 26, 46, 0.85) 0%, rgba(74, 0, 224, 0.6) 100%); /* Dark overlay with a hint of purple */
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            max-width: 900px;
            padding: var(--spacing-lg);
            animation: fadeInScale 1s ease-out forwards;
        }

        .hero-content h1 {
            font-size: var(--h1-size);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            font-weight: 800;
            background: var(--gradient-primary); /* Gradient text */
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback */
            text-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); /* Depth */
        }

        .hero-content p {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            font-weight: 300;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }

        .hero-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-md);
            justify-content: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        /* Mission Section */
        .mission-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-xxl);
        }

        .mission-item {
            text-align: center;
            padding: var(--spacing-lg);
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
            background-color: var(--color-bg-medium);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .mission-item:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
        }

        .mission-item .icon-large {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
            display: block;
        }

        .gradient-text {
            background: var(--gradient-secondary); /* Vibrant icons */
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            color: transparent; /* Fallback */
        }

        /* Features/Services: Modern grid layout (3 columns desktop, responsive) */
        .features-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-xxl);
        }

        .feature-card {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            text-align: left;
        }

        .feature-card .feature-icon {
            font-size: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .feature-card p {
            flex-grow: 1;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .feature-card .read-more {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            color: var(--color-secondary-start);
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .feature-card .read-more i {
            margin-left: var(--spacing-xs);
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .feature-card .read-more:hover i {
            transform: translateX(5px);
        }

        /* About section: Two-column layout with image and copy */
        .about-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: var(--spacing-xxl);
            align-items: center;
        }

        .about-image {
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: transform 0.6s ease-out, opacity 0.6s ease-out;
        }

        .about-image img {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            display: block;
            object-fit: cover;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
        }

        .about-content h2 {
            text-align: left;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .about-content p {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
        }

        .about-content .btn {
            margin-top: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        /* Testimonials: Modern card-based layout */
        .testimonials-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-xxl);
        }

        .testimonial-card {
            padding: var(--spacing-xl);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .testimonial-card .quote {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            font-style: italic;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-lg);
            flex-grow: 1;
        }

        .client-info {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: var(--spacing-sm);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .client-avatar {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            border: 2px solid var(--color-secondary-start);
        }

        .client-name {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xxs);
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }

        .client-title {
            color: var(--color-text-muted);
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        /* Contact form: Clean, modern form */
        .contact-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1.5fr; /* Info on left, form on right */
            gap: var(--spacing-xxl);
            margin-top: var(--spacing-xxl);
        }

        .contact-info h3 {
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .contact-info p {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: var(--spacing-xs);
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
        }

        .contact-info p i {
            color: var(--color-accent-start);
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .social-links {
            margin-top: var(--spacing-lg);
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .social-links a {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--color-text-muted);
            transition: color var(--transition-speed), transform var(--transition-speed);
            min-width: 44px; /* Touch-friendly */
            min-height: 44px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background-color: var(--color-bg-medium);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
        }

        .social-links a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary-start);
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            background-color: var(--color-glass-bg);
        }

        .contact-form {
            padding: var(--spacing-xl);
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
            background-color: var(--color-glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
        }

        .contact-form .form-group {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .contact-form label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
            font-weight: 500;
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            font-size: 1rem;
        }

        .contact-form input[type="text"],
        .contact-form input[type="email"],
        .contact-form textarea {
            width: 100%;
            padding: var(--spacing-md);
            border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-sm);
            background-color: var(--color-bg-medium);
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 1rem;
            transition: border-color var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .contact-form input[type="text"]:focus,
        .contact-form input[type="email"]:focus,
        .contact-form textarea:focus {
            border-color: var(--color-secondary-start);
            outline: none;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(63, 94, 251, 0.2);
        }

        .contact-form textarea {
            resize: vertical;
            min-height: 120px;
        }

        .contact-form .btn {
            width: 100%;
            margin-top: var(--spacing-lg);
        }

        /* Footer: Dark background with organized links */
        .footer {
            background-color: var(--color-bg-medium);
            padding: var(--section-padding) 0 var(--spacing-md);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--color-border);
            color: var(--color-text-muted);
            text-align: center;
        }

        .footer .container {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: var(--spacing-xxl);
            text-align: left;
        }

        .footer-content {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--spacing-xl);
            text-align: left;
        }

        .footer-brand .logo {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
        }

        .footer-nav h3, .footer-contact h3 {
            color: var(--color-text-light);
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-md);
        }

        .footer-nav ul {
            padding: 0;
        }

        .footer-nav ul li {
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xs);
        }

        .footer-nav ul li a {
            color: var(--color-text-muted);
            transition: color var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .footer-nav ul li a:hover {
            color: var(--color-secondary-start);
        }

        .footer-contact p {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: var(--spacing-xs);
            margin-bottom: var(--spacing-sm);
            color: var(--color-text-muted);
        }

        .footer-contact p i {
            color: var(--color-accent-start);
            font-size: 1rem;
        }

        .footer-bottom {
            margin-top: var(--spacing-xxl);
            padding-top: var(--spacing-md);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--color-border);
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            text-align: center;
        }

        /* Micro-animations */
        @keyframes fadeInScale {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: scale(0.95);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: scale(1);
            }
        }

        /* Scroll Reveal Animations */
        .reveal-left {
            transform: translateX(-50px);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: transform 0.8s ease-out, opacity 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        .reveal-right {
            transform: translateX(50px);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: transform 0.8s ease-out, opacity 0.8s ease-out;
        }
        .reveal-up {
            transform: translateY(50px);
            opacity: 0;
            transition: transform 0.8s ease-out, opacity 0.8s ease-out;
        }

        .section.reveal .reveal-left,
        .section.reveal .reveal-right,
        .section.reveal .reveal-up {
            transform: translate(0);
            opacity: 1;
        }

        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .nav-menu {
                gap: var(--spacing-md);
            }

            .section-title {
                font-size: clamp(2rem, 5vw, 3.5rem);
            }

            .section-subtitle {
                font-size: 1.1rem;
                margin-bottom: var(--spacing-xl);
            }

            .about-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr; /* Stack on tablet */
            }
            .about-image.reveal-left, .about-content.reveal-right {
                transform: translateY(20px); /* Reset horizontal transform for tablet, use vertical */
            }
            .section.reveal .reveal-left,
            .section.reveal .reveal-right {
                transform: translateY(0);
            }

            .contact-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr; /* Stack on tablet */
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .navbar .container {
                flex-wrap: wrap;
            }
            .nav-menu {
                display: none; /* Hide by default for mobile */
                flex-direction: column;
                width: 100%;
                background-color: var(--color-glass-bg);
                backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
                -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
                position: absolute;
                top: 100%;
                left: 0;
                padding: var(--spacing-md) 0;
                border-top: 1px solid var(--color-border);
                align-items: center;
            }
            .nav-menu.active {
                display: flex; /* Show when active */
            }
            .nav-menu a {
                width: 100%;
                text-align: center;
                padding: var(--spacing-sm) 0;
                border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            }
            .nav-menu a:last-child {
                border-bottom: none;
            }
            .nav-menu a.btn {
                margin-top: var(--spacing-md);
                width: 80%;
            }
            .nav-menu a:not(.btn)::after {
                left: 50%;
                transform: translateX(-50%);
            }

            .hamburger {
                display: block; /* Show hamburger menu */
            }

            .hero-content h1 {
                font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 8vw, 4rem);
            }

            .hero-content p {
                font-size: 1.1rem;
            }

            .hero-actions {
                flex-direction: column; /* Stack buttons */
                gap: var(--spacing-sm);
            }

            .mission-grid, .features-grid, .testimonials-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr; /* Stack all grids */
            }

            .about-content h2 {
                text-align: center;
            }

            .contact-info, .contact-form {
                text-align: center;
                margin: 0 auto;
                max-width: 500px;
            }
            .contact-info p {
                justify-content: center;
            }
            .social-links {
                justify-content: center;
            }

            .footer-content {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr; /* Stack footer columns */
                text-align: center;
            }
            .footer-brand, .footer-nav, .footer-contact {
                text-align: center;
            }
            .footer-brand .logo {
                 margin-left: auto;
                 margin-right: auto;
            }
            .footer-nav ul {
                padding-left: 0;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            :root {
                --section-padding: 60px 0;
                --container-padding-x: 16px;
            }

            .btn {
                padding: 12px 24px;
                font-size: 0.9rem;
            }

            .btn-large {
                padding: 14px 28px;
                font-size: 1rem;
            }

            .hero-content h1 {
                font-size: clamp(2rem, 9vw, 3.5rem);
            }

            .hero-content p {
                font-size: 1rem;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header class="navbar" id="navbar">
        <div class="container">
            <a href="#" class="logo" aria-label="Ascendance Foundry Home">Ascendance Foundry</a>
            <nav class="nav-menu" id="nav-menu">
                <a href="#solutions">Solutions</a>
                <a href="#products">Products</a>
                <a href="#about">About Us</a>
                <a href="#careers">Careers</a>
                <a href="#contact" class="btn btn-gradient">Contact</a>
            </nav>
            <button class="hamburger" aria-label="Toggle navigation menu" aria-expanded="false">
                <i class="fas fa-bars"></i>
            </button>
        </div>
    </header>

    <main>
        <section id="hero" class="hero">
            <div class="hero-content">
                <h1>Forge the Future. Elevate Your Vision.</h1>
                <p>We empower enterprises with cutting-edge technology and strategic innovation to redefine what's possible.</p>
                <div class="hero-actions">
                    <a href="#solutions" class="btn btn-gradient btn-large">Explore Solutions</a>
                    <a href="#contact" class="btn btn-outline btn-large">Get in Touch</a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="mission" class="section">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 class="section-title">Our Unwavering Commitment to Innovation</h2>
                <p class="section-subtitle">At Ascendance Foundry, we believe in pushing boundaries. Our mission is to transform complex challenges into elegant, impactful solutions that drive real-world progress.</p>
                <div class="mission-grid">
                    <div class="mission-item reveal-up">
                        <i class="fas fa-lightbulb icon-large gradient-text"></i>
                        <h3>Pioneering Vision</h3>
                        <p>We constantly seek out the next frontier in technology, ensuring our clients are always a step ahead.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mission-item reveal-up">
                        <i class="fas fa-handshake icon-large gradient-text"></i>
                        <h3>Collaborative Excellence</h3>
                        <p>Building strong partnerships is at our core. We work with you, for you, every step of the way.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mission-item reveal-up">
                        <i class="fas fa-rocket icon-large gradient-text"></i>
                        <h3>Impactful Solutions</h3>
                        <p>Our focus is on delivering measurable results and creating lasting value for your business.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="solutions" class="section">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 class="section-title">Revolutionary Solutions for Tomorrow's Challenges</h2>
                <p class="section-subtitle">From AI-driven analytics to robust cloud infrastructure, our expertise spans the critical technologies shaping the future.</p>
                <div class="features-grid">
                    <div class="feature-card card reveal-up">
                        <i class="fas fa-brain feature-icon gradient-text"></i>
                        <h3>AI & Machine Learning</h3>
                        <p>Unlock predictive insights and automate complex processes with our intelligent AI solutions.</p>
                        <a href="#" class="read-more" aria-label="Learn more about AI and Machine Learning">Learn More <i class="fas fa-arrow-right"></i></a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-card card reveal-up">
                        <i class="fas fa-cloud feature-icon gradient-text"></i>
                        <h3>Cloud Infrastructure</h3>
                        <p>Scalable, secure, and resilient cloud architectures tailored to your enterprise needs.</p>
                        <a href="#" class="read-more" aria-label="Learn more about Cloud Infrastructure">Learn More <i class="fas fa-arrow-right"></i></a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-card card reveal-up">
                        <i class="fas fa-shield-alt feature-icon gradient-text"></i>
                        <h3>Cybersecurity & Compliance</h3>
                        <p>Protect your assets and ensure regulatory adherence with our advanced security protocols.</p>
                        <a href="#" class="read-more" aria-label="Learn more about Cybersecurity and Compliance">Learn More <i class="fas fa-arrow-right"></i></a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-card card reveal-up">
                        <i class="fas fa-chart-line feature-icon gradient-text"></i>
                        <h3>Data Analytics & BI</h3>
                        <p>Transform raw data into actionable intelligence with our powerful business intelligence tools.</p>
                        <a href="#" class="read-more" aria-label="Learn more about Data Analytics and Business Intelligence">Learn More <i class="fas fa-arrow-right"></i></a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-card card reveal-up">
                        <i class="fas fa-code-branch feature-icon gradient-text"></i>
                        <h3>DevOps & Automation</h3>
                        <p>Streamline your development cycles and deployment with expert DevOps strategies.</p>
                        <a href="#" class="read-more" aria-label="Learn more about DevOps and Automation">Learn More <i class="fas fa-arrow-right"></i></a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="feature-card card reveal-up">
                        <i class="fas fa-globe feature-icon gradient-text"></i>
                        <h3>Blockchain & Web3</h3>
                        <p>Explore decentralized solutions and secure ledger technologies for next-gen applications.</p>
                        <a href="#" class="read-more" aria-label="Learn more about Blockchain and Web3">Learn More <i class="fas fa-arrow-right"></i></a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="about" class="section">
            <div class="container about-grid">
                <div class="about-image reveal-left">
                    <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1554971672-091448c99a35?w=800&h=600&fit=crop" alt="Team collaborating on a project in a modern office" loading="lazy">
                </div>
                <div class="about-content reveal-right">
                    <h2 class="section-title">Innovating for a Brighter Tomorrow</h2>
                    <p>Ascendance Foundry was founded on the principle that technology should serve humanity, not the other way around. For over a decade, we've been at the forefront of digital transformation, partnering with industry leaders to build solutions that are not just cutting-edge, but also sustainable and impactful.</p>
                    <p>Our diverse team of engineers, designers, and strategists are united by a passion for excellence and a commitment to ethical innovation. We thrive on challenges, turning complex problems into elegant, user-centric experiences.</p>
                    <a href="#careers" class="btn btn-gradient">Join Our Team</a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="testimonials" class="section">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 class="section-title">What Our Partners Say About Us</h2>
                <p class="section-subtitle">Real results, real impact. Hear directly from the leaders we've empowered.</p>
                <div class="testimonials-grid">
                    <div class="testimonial-card card reveal-up">
                        <p class="quote">"Ascendance Foundry transformed our entire data infrastructure. Their expertise in AI and cloud solutions is unmatched. A true game-changer for our business!"</p>
                        <div class="client-info">
                            <img src="https://picsum.photos/60/60?random=1" alt="Client Avatar Dr. Evelyn Reed" class="client-avatar" loading="lazy">
                            <div>
                                <p class="client-name">Dr. Evelyn Reed</p>
                                <p class="client-title">CTO, Apex Innovations</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="testimonial-card card reveal-up">
                        <p class="quote">"Working with Ascendance Foundry was an absolute pleasure. Their team's dedication to understanding our needs and delivering beyond expectations was remarkable."</p>
                        <div class="client-info">
                            <img src="https://picsum.photos/60/60?random=2" alt="Client Avatar Marcus Thorne" class="client-avatar" loading="lazy">
                            <div>
                                <p class="client-name">Marcus Thorne</p>
                                <p class="client-title">CEO, Quantum Dynamics</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="testimonial-card card reveal-up">
                        <p class="quote">"They didn't just provide a solution; they provided a partnership. Their cybersecurity insights have been invaluable, giving us peace of mind in a complex digital landscape."</p>
                        <div class="client-info">
                            <img src="https://picsum.photos/60/60?random=3" alt="Client Avatar Sarah Chen" class="client-avatar" loading="lazy">
                            <div>
                                <p class="client-name">Sarah Chen</p>
                                <p class="client-title">VP of Operations, NovaTech</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="contact" class="section">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 class="section-title">Let's Build Something Extraordinary Together</h2>
                <p class="section-subtitle">Ready to elevate your enterprise? Reach out to us and discover how Ascendance Foundry can empower your next big leap.</p>
                <div class="contact-grid">
                    <div class="contact-info reveal-left">
                        <h3>Connect With Us</h3>
                        <p><i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i> 123 Innovation Drive, Tech City, TX 78701</p>
                        <p><i class="fas fa-phone"></i> <a href="tel:+15551234567">+1 (555) 123-4567</a></p>
                        <p><i class="fas fa-envelope"></i> <a href="mailto:info@ascendancefoundry.com">info@ascendancefoundry.com</a></p>
                        <div class="social-links">
                            <a href="#" aria-label="LinkedIn profile"><i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i></a>
                            <a href="#" aria-label="Twitter profile"><i class="fab fa-twitter"></i></a>
                            <a href="#" aria-label="Facebook profile"><i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i></a>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <form class="contact-form card reveal-right">
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="name">Name</label>
                            <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required aria-label="Your Name">
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="email">Email</label>
                            <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required aria-label="Your Email Address">
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="subject">Subject</label>
                            <input type="text" id="subject" name="subject" required aria-label="Subject of your message">
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <label for="message">Message</label>
                            <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="5" required aria-label="Your Message"></textarea>
                        </div>
                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-gradient btn-large">Send Message</button>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

    <footer class="footer">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="footer-content">
                <div class="footer-brand">
                    <a href="#" class="logo" aria-label="Ascendance Foundry Home">Ascendance Foundry</a>
                    <p>Innovating for a brighter, more connected future.</p>
                </div>
                <nav class="footer-nav">
                    <h3>Quick Links</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li><a href="#solutions">Solutions</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#products">Products</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#careers">Careers</a></li>
                    </ul>
                </nav>
                <nav class="footer-nav">
                    <h3>Resources</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li><a href="#">Blog</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Support</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Privacy Policy</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Terms of Service</a></li>
                    </ul>
                </nav>
                <div class="footer-contact">
                    <h3>Contact Us</h3>
                    <p><i class="fas fa-envelope"></i> <a href="mailto:info@ascendancefoundry.com">info@ascendancefoundry.com</a></p>
                    <p><i class="fas fa-phone"></i> <a href="tel:+15551234567">+1 (555) 123-4567</a></p>
                    <div class="social-links">
                        <a href="#" aria-label="LinkedIn profile"><i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i></a>
                        <a href="#" aria-label="Twitter profile"><i class="fab fa-twitter"></i></a>
                        <a href="#" aria-label="Facebook profile"><i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i></a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="footer-bottom">
                <p>© 2023 Ascendance Foundry. All rights reserved.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </footer>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            // Hamburger Menu Toggle
            const hamburger = document.querySelector('.hamburger');
            const navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');

            hamburger.addEventListener('click', () => {
                navMenu.classList.toggle('active');
                const expanded = navMenu.classList.contains('active');
                hamburger.setAttribute('aria-expanded', expanded);
                if (expanded) {
                    hamburger.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-times"></i>'; // Change icon to 'X'
                } else {
                    hamburger.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-bars"></i>'; // Change icon back to bars
                }
            });

            // Close nav menu when a link is clicked (for mobile)
            document.querySelectorAll('.nav-menu a').forEach(link => {
                link.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    if (navMenu.classList.contains('active')) {
                        navMenu.classList.remove('active');
                        hamburger.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
                        hamburger.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-bars"></i>';
                    }
                });
            });

            // Scroll Reveal Animations using Intersection Observer
            const observerOptions = {
                root: null,
                rootMargin: '0px',
                threshold: 0.15 // Trigger when 15% of the element is visible
            };

            const sectionObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        entry.target.classList.add('reveal');
                        observer.unobserve(entry.target); // Stop observing once revealed
                    }
                });
            }, observerOptions);

            document.querySelectorAll('.section').forEach(section => {
                sectionObserver.observe(section);
            });

            // Specific reveal classes for elements within sections (e.g., about, contact grid items)
            const revealElements = document.querySelectorAll('.reveal-left, .reveal-right, .reveal-up');
            const elementObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        entry.target.classList.add('reveal');
                        observer.unobserve(entry.target);
                    }
                });
            }, {
                root: null,
                rootMargin: '0px',
                threshold: 0.1
            });

            revealElements.forEach(el => {
                elementObserver.observe(el);
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>
