websiteContent.index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Ascendance Foundry - Elevating Your Digital Presence</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Ascendance Foundry offers world-class digital solutions, from strategic consulting to cutting-edge web development and marketing.">
    <link rel="icon" href="https://via.placeholder.com/32/6366f1/ffffff?text=AF">

    <!-- Google Fonts -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800&family=Poppins:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <!-- Font Awesome -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">

    <style>
        /* CSS Variables for Color Theme */
        :root {
            --primary: #6366f1; /* Indigo */
            --secondary: #8b5cf6; /* Purple */
            --accent: #a78bfa; /* Light Purple */
            --gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #4f46e5 0%, #6366f1 50%, #8b5cf6 100%);
            --gradient-hover: linear-gradient(135deg, #8b5cf6 0%, #6366f1 50%, #4f46e5 100%); /* Reversed for hover */
            --dark: #1e1b4b;
            --light: #f5f3ff;
            --text-dark: #1e1b4b;
            --text-light: #f5f3ff;
            --shadow-light: 0 10px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            --shadow-premium: 0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.15), 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);

            --font-heading: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            --font-body: 'Inter', sans-serif;

            --border-radius-sm: 8px;
            --border-radius-md: 16px;
            --border-radius-lg: 24px;

            --transition-speed: 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        /* Base Styles */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }

        body {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            color: var(--text-dark);
            line-height: 1.6;
            background-color: var(--light);
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 1.5rem;
        }

        a {
            text-decoration: none;
            color: var(--primary);
            transition: color var(--transition-speed);
        }

        a:hover {
            color: var(--secondary);
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            color: var(--dark);
            line-height: 1.2;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        h1 { font-size: 3.5rem; } /* Desktop */
        h2 { font-size: 2.8rem; }
        h3 { font-size: 2.2rem; }
        h4 { font-size: 1.8rem; }
        p { margin-bottom: 1rem; }

        /* Buttons */
        .btn {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 0.9rem 2rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-sm);
            font-weight: 600;
            text-align: center;
            white-space: nowrap;
            cursor: pointer;
            border: none;
            transition: all var(--transition-speed);
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-size: 1rem;
        }

        .btn-primary {
            background: var(--gradient);
            color: var(--text-light);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3);
        }

        .btn-primary:hover {
            background: var(--gradient-hover);
            box-shadow: 0 12px 35px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.4);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background-color: transparent;
            color: var(--primary);
            border: 2px solid var(--primary);
            padding: 0.7rem 1.8rem;
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background-color: var(--primary);
            color: var(--text-light);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        /* Section Styling */
        section {
            padding: 6rem 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .section-heading {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 4rem;
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--dark);
        }

        .section-subheading {
            text-align: center;
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: -3rem auto 4rem auto;
            color: #555;
            font-size: 1.15rem;
        }

        /* Navbar */
        .navbar {
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1000;
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); /* Semi-transparent background */
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px); /* Glassmorphism effect */
            padding: 1rem 0;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
            transition: background-color var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .navbar-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .logo {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--dark);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .logo i {
            margin-right: 0.5rem;
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 2rem;
        }

        .nav-links {
            list-style: none;
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
        }

        .nav-links a {
            color: var(--dark);
            font-weight: 600;
            padding: 0.5rem 0;
            position: relative;
        }

        .nav-links a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 3px;
            background: var(--gradient);
            transition: width var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .nav-links a:hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .nav-toggle {
            display: none;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            color: var(--dark);
            cursor: pointer;
            background: none;
            border: none;
        }

        /* Hero Section */
        .hero {
            height: 100vh;
            background-image: url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522071820081-009f0129c71c?w=1920&h=1080&fit=crop'); /* Team working */
            background-size: cover;
            background-position: center;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(30, 27, 75, 0.7) 0%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.6) 100%); /* Dark overlay with gradient */
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            max-width: 900px;
            padding: 2rem;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out forwards;
        }

        .hero-content h1 {
            font-size: 4.5rem; /* Large hero text */
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--text-light);
            text-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
        }

        .hero-content p {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
            color: var(--light);
            max-width: 700px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }

        .hero-buttons {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 1.5rem;
        }

        /* Services Section */
        .services-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
            margin-top: 3rem;
        }

        .service-card {
            background-color: #fff;
            padding: 2.5rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            text-align: center;
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            border: 1px solid rgba(var(--primary), 0.05);
        }

        .service-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 5px;
            background: var(--gradient);
            transform: translateY(-100%);
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .service-card:hover::before {
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .service-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 70px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        }

        .service-card .icon {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            color: var(--primary);
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            background: var(--light);
            border-radius: 50%;
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.2);
        }
        
        .service-card .service-img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 200px;
            object-fit: cover;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-sm);
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }

        .service-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: var(--dark);
        }

        .service-card p {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: #666;
        }

        /* About Section */
        .about-content {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 4rem;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .about-text h2 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .about-text p {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: #444;
        }

        .about-image {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 1rem;
            background-color: #fff;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
        }
        
        .about-image img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
            display: block;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        .about-image:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: 0 30px 80px rgba(0,0,0,0.25), 0 15px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }

        /* Testimonials Section */
        .testimonials {
            background-color: var(--primary);
            color: var(--text-light);
            padding: 8rem 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            background-image: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--dark) 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
        }

        .testimonials::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50px;
            left: -50px;
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
            border-radius: 50%;
            transform: rotate(45deg);
        }

        .testimonials::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -50px;
            right: -50px;
            width: 250px;
            height: 250px;
            background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
            border-radius: 50%;
            transform: rotate(-30deg);
        }

        .testimonials .section-heading {
            color: var(--text-light);
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        .testimonials .section-subheading {
            color: var(--light);
            margin-bottom: 4rem;
        }

        .testimonial-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
        }

        .testimonial-card {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); /* Glassmorphism background */
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            padding: 2.5rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
            color: var(--text-light);
            text-align: center;
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        }

        .testimonial-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        }

        .testimonial-card img {
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            border: 4px solid var(--accent);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 6px rgba(255,255,255,0.1), 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        }

        .testimonial-card p {
            font-style: italic;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            line-height: 1.8;
            color: var(--light);
        }

        .testimonial-card .client-name {
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 0.2rem;
        }

        .testimonial-card .client-title {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: var(--light);
            opacity: 0.8;
        }

        /* Contact Section */
        .contact-content {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1.2fr;
            gap: 4rem;
            align-items: flex-start;
        }

        .contact-info h2 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .contact-info p {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            color: #444;
        }

        .contact-details ul {
            list-style: none;
        }

        .contact-details li {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            color: #333;
        }

        .contact-details li i {
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            margin-right: 1rem;
            width: 30px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .contact-form {
            background-color: #fff;
            padding: 3rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .contact-form:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 70px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        }

        .contact-form .form-group {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .contact-form label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 0.6rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--dark);
            font-size: 1rem;
        }

        .contact-form input[type="text"],
        .contact-form input[type="email"],
        .contact-form textarea {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 1.2rem;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-sm);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--dark);
            transition: border-color var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .contact-form input[type="text"]:focus,
        .contact-form input[type="email"]:focus,
        .contact-form textarea:focus {
            border-color: var(--primary);
            outline: none;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.2);
        }

        .contact-form textarea {
            resize: vertical;
            min-height: 120px;
        }

        .contact-form .btn {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 2rem;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }

        /* Footer */
        .footer {
            background-color: var(--dark);
            color: var(--light);
            padding: 4rem 0;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        .footer-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
        }

        .footer-col h4 {
            color: var(--accent);
            font-size: 1.3rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        .footer-col ul {
            list-style: none;
        }

        .footer-col ul li {
            margin-bottom: 0.8rem;
        }

        .footer-col ul li a {
            color: var(--light);
            opacity: 0.8;
            transition: opacity var(--transition-speed), color var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .footer-col ul li a:hover {
            color: var(--accent);
            opacity: 1;
        }

        .footer-bottom {
            text-align: center;
            padding-top: 2rem;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: var(--light);
            opacity: 0.7;
        }

        .social-icons {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 1.5rem;
            margin-top: 1.5rem;
        }

        .social-icons a {
            color: var(--light);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            transition: color var(--transition-speed), transform var(--transition-speed);
            opacity: 0.8;
        }

        .social-icons a:hover {
            color: var(--accent);
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            opacity: 1;
        }

        /* Keyframe Animations */
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .hero-content h1 {
                font-size: 3.5rem;
            }
            .hero-content p {
                font-size: 1.3rem;
            }
            .section-heading {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }
            .about-content, .contact-content {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            .about-image {
                order: -1; /* Image above text on smaller screens */
                margin-bottom: 2rem;
            }
            .contact-form {
                order: -1;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .navbar-container {
                padding: 0 1.5rem;
            }
            .nav-links {
                display: none;
                flex-direction: column;
                position: absolute;
                top: 100%;
                left: 0;
                width: 100%;
                background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
                backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
                box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
                padding: 1.5rem 0;
                border-top: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
            }
            .nav-links.active {
                display: flex;
            }
            .nav-links li {
                text-align: center;
                margin-bottom: 1rem;
            }
            .nav-links a {
                padding: 0.8rem 0;
                font-size: 1.1rem;
            }
            .nav-toggle {
                display: block;
            }
            .navbar .btn {
                display: none; /* Hide CTA button in mobile nav bar, can be added to dropdown if preferred */
            }

            .hero {
                height: auto;
                padding: 8rem 0;
            }
            .hero-content h1 {
                font-size: 2.8rem; /* Mobile hero text */
            }
            .hero-content p {
                font-size: 1.1rem;
            }
            .hero-buttons {
                flex-direction: column;
                gap: 1rem;
            }
            .btn {
                width: 100%;
                max-width: 300px;
                margin: 0 auto;
            }
            
            section {
                padding: 4rem 0;
            }
            .section-heading {
                font-size: 2rem;
                margin-bottom: 2rem;
            }
            .section-subheading {
                font-size: 1rem;
                margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
            }

            .service-card, .testimonial-card {
                padding: 2rem;
            }
            .about-text h2, .contact-info h2 {
                font-size: 2.2rem;
            }
            .contact-form {
                padding: 2rem;
            }
            .footer-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                text-align: center;
            }
            .footer-col h4 {
                margin-top: 2rem;
            }
            .footer-col ul {
                padding: 0;
            }
            .social-icons {
                margin-top: 1rem;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            .hero-content h1 {
                font-size: 2.2rem;
            }
            .hero-content p {
                font-size: 0.95rem;
            }
            .btn {
                padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem;
                font-size: 0.9rem;
            }
            .section-heading {
                font-size: 1.8rem;
            }
            .service-card .icon {
                font-size: 2.8rem;
                width: 70px;
                height: 70px;
            }
            .service-card h3 {
                font-size: 1.5rem;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <!-- Navigation Bar -->
    <nav class="navbar">
        <div class="container navbar-container">
            <a href="#" class="logo">
                <i class="fas fa-meteor"></i> Ascendance Foundry
            </a>
            <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="toggle navigation">
                <i class="fas fa-bars"></i>
            </button>
            <ul class="nav-links">
                <li><a href="#hero">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>
                <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
                <li><a href="#testimonials">Testimonials</a></li>
                <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>
                <li><a href="#contact" class="btn btn-primary">Get a Quote</a></li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section id="hero" class="hero">
        <div class="hero-content">
            <h1>Elevate Your Vision with Digital Excellence</h1>
            <p>We craft bespoke digital strategies and solutions, empowering businesses to thrive in the modern landscape. Partner with Ascendance Foundry for unparalleled growth.</p>
            <div class="hero-buttons">
                <a href="#services" class="btn btn-primary">Explore Our Services</a>
                <a href="#contact" class="btn btn-secondary">Get a Free Consultation</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Services Section -->
    <section id="services" class="services">
        <div class="container">
            <h2 class="section-heading">What We Offer</h2>
            <p class="section-subheading">From innovative web development to strategic digital marketing, our comprehensive services are designed to propel your business forward.</p>
            <div class="services-grid">
                <div class="service-card">
                    <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551434678-e076c223a692?w=600&h=400&fit=crop" alt="Team Collaboration" class="service-img">
                    <h3>Strategic Consulting</h3>
                    <p>Unlock your business's full potential with expert guidance. We help you define clear goals and develop actionable roadmaps for success.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="service-card">
                    <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1552664730-d307ca884978?w=600&h=400&fit=crop" alt="Workshop" class="service-img">
                    <h3>Web & App Development</h3>
                    <p>Crafting responsive, high-performance websites and mobile applications tailored to your specific needs and user experience.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="service-card">
                    <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1553877522-43269d4ea984?w=600&h=400&fit=crop" alt="Strategy Meeting" class="service-img">
                    <h3>Digital Marketing</h3>
                    <p>Amplify your brand's reach with data-driven SEO, content marketing, social media strategies, and targeted advertising campaigns.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="service-card">
                    <div class="icon"><i class="fas fa-chart-line"></i></div>
                    <h3>Data Analytics & Insights</h3>
                    <p>Leverage the power of data to make informed decisions. We provide comprehensive analytics and reporting to optimize your operations.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- About Section -->
    <section id="about" class="about">
        <div class="container about-content">
            <div class="about-text">
                <h2 class="section-heading" style="text-align: left;">Who We Are</h2>
                <p>Ascendance Foundry is a collective of passionate digital strategists, developers, and creatives committed to delivering innovative solutions. We believe in building strong partnerships and empowering our clients with the tools and insights needed to dominate their respective markets.</p>
                <p>Our approach is rooted in understanding your unique challenges and opportunities. We combine cutting-edge technology with creative problem-solving to ensure every project not only meets but exceeds expectations. Join us on a journey to digital ascendancy.</p>
                <a href="#contact" class="btn btn-primary">Learn More</a>
            </div>
            <div class="about-image">
                <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1504384308090-c894fdcc538d?w=1920&h=1080&fit=crop" alt="Tech workspace with a large photo">
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Testimonials Section -->
    <section id="testimonials" class="testimonials">
        <div class="container">
            <h2 class="section-heading">What Our Clients Say</h2>
            <p class="section-subheading">Hear directly from businesses that have experienced significant growth and transformation through our partnership.</p>
            <div class="testimonial-grid">
                <div class="testimonial-card">
                    <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=100&h=100&fit=crop" alt="Client 1">
                    <p>"Ascendance Foundry delivered beyond our expectations. Their strategic insights transformed our online presence and significantly boosted our lead generation."</p>
                    <div class="client-name">Sarah Chen</div>
                    <div class="client-title">CEO, Innovate Solutions</div>
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-card">
                    <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop" alt="Client 2">
                    <p>"The team at Ascendance Foundry is exceptional. Their web development expertise is unmatched, and their dedication to our project was truly inspiring."</p>
                    <div class="client-name">Michael B.</div>
                    <div class="client-title">Founder, Global Tech</div>
                </div>
                <div class="testimonial-card">
                    <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=100&h=100&fit=crop" alt="Client 3">
                    <p>"Working with them was a game-changer. Their digital marketing strategies brought us tangible results and a clear ROI. Highly recommend!"</p>
                    <div class="client-name">Jessica R.</div>
                    <div class="client-title">Marketing Director, Future Brands</div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Contact Section -->
    <section id="contact" class="contact">
        <div class="container contact-content">
            <div class="contact-info">
                <h2 class="section-heading" style="text-align: left;">Get In Touch</h2>
                <p>Ready to start your next project or have a question? Reach out to us using the contact form or connect with us directly via the details below.</p>
                <div class="contact-details">
                    <ul>
                        <li><i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt"></i> 123 Digital Way, Innovation City, 90210</li>
                        <li><i class="fas fa-phone-alt"></i> +1 (555) 123-4567</li>
                        <li><i class="fas fa-envelope"></i> info@ascendancefoundry.com</li>
                        <li><i class="fas fa-clock"></i> Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="contact-form">
                <form action="#" method="POST">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="name">Your Name</label>
                        <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required placeholder="John Doe">
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="email">Your Email</label>
                        <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required placeholder="john.doe@example.com">
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="subject">Subject</label>
                        <input type="text" id="subject" name="subject" required placeholder="Project Inquiry">
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="message">Your Message</label>
                        <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="5" required placeholder="Tell us about your project..."></textarea>
                    </div>
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Send Message</button>
                </form>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <footer class="footer">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="footer-grid">
                <div class="footer-col">
                    <a href="#" class="logo" style="color: var(--light); margin-bottom: 1rem; display: inline-block;">
                        <i class="fas fa-meteor" style="color: var(--accent);"></i> Ascendance Foundry
                    </a>
                    <p style="color: rgba(245, 243, 255, 0.8);">Crafting digital masterpieces to elevate your brand. Partner with us for innovation and growth.</p>
                    <div class="social-icons">
                        <a href="#" aria-label="Facebook"><i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i></a>
                        <a href="#" aria-label="Twitter"><i class="fab fa-twitter"></i></a>
                        <a href="#" aria-label="LinkedIn"><i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i></a>
                        <a href="#" aria-label="Instagram"><i class="fab fa-instagram"></i></a>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="footer-col">
                    <h4>Quick Links</h4>
                    <ul>
                        <li><a href="#hero">Home</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#services">Services</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#about">About Us</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#testimonials">Testimonials</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#contact">Contact</a></li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="footer-col">
                    <h4>Our Services</h4>
                    <ul>
                        <li><a href="#">Strategic Consulting</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Web Development</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">App Development</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Digital Marketing</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Data Analytics</a></li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="footer-col">
                    <h4>Legal</h4>
                    <ul>
                        <li><a href="#">Privacy Policy</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Terms of Service</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Cookie Policy</a></li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="footer-bottom">
                © 2023 Ascendance Foundry. All rights reserved.
            </div>
        </div>
    </footer>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            const navToggle = document.querySelector('.nav-toggle');
            const navLinks = document.querySelector('.nav-links');

            navToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
                navLinks.classList.toggle('active');
                const icon = navToggle.querySelector('i');
                if (navLinks.classList.contains('active')) {
                    icon.classList.remove('fa-bars');
                    icon.classList.add('fa-times');
                } else {
                    icon.classList.remove('fa-times');
                    icon.classList.add('fa-bars');
                }
            });

            // Close mobile menu when a link is clicked
            document.querySelectorAll('.nav-links a').forEach(link => {
                link.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    if (navLinks.classList.contains('active')) {
                        navLinks.classList.remove('active');
                        const icon = navToggle.querySelector('i');
                        icon.classList.remove('fa-times');
                        icon.classList.add('fa-bars');
                    }
                });
            });

            // Smooth scroll for internal links
            document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
                anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                    e.preventDefault();

                    document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')).scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth'
                    });
                });
            });

            // Optional: Add scroll animation for sections
            const observerOptions = {
                root: null,
                rootMargin: '0px',
                threshold: 0.1
            };

            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        entry.target.style.opacity = '1';
                        entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                    } else {
                        // Optional: Reset for re-animation on scroll back up
                        // entry.target.style.opacity = '0';
                        // entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(50px)';
                    }
                });
            }, observerOptions);

            document.querySelectorAll('section:not(#hero)').forEach(section => {
                section.style.opacity = '0';
                section.style.transform = 'translateY(50px)';
                section.style.transition = 'opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out';
                observer.observe(section);
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

websiteContent.index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Ascendance Foundry - Elevating Your Digital Presence</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Ascendance Foundry offers world-class digital solutions, from strategic consulting to cutting-edge web development and marketing.">
    <link rel="icon" href="https://via.placeholder.com/32/6366f1/ffffff?text=AF">

    <!-- Google Fonts -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800&family=Poppins:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <!-- Font Awesome -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">

    <style>
        /* CSS Variables for Color Theme */
        :root {
            --primary: #6366f1; /* Indigo */
            --secondary: #8b5cf6; /* Purple */
            --accent: #a78bfa; /* Light Purple */
            --gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #4f46e5 0%, #6366f1 50%, #8b5cf6 100%);
            --gradient-hover: linear-gradient(135deg, #8b5cf6 0%, #6366f1 50%, #4f46e5 100%); /* Reversed for hover */
            --dark: #1e1b4b;
            --light: #f5f3ff;
            --text-dark: #1e1b4b;
            --text-light: #f5f3ff;
            --shadow-light: 0 10px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
            --shadow-premium: 0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.15), 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);

            --font-heading: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            --font-body: 'Inter', sans-serif;

            --border-radius-sm: 8px;
            --border-radius-md: 16px;
            --border-radius-lg: 24px;

            --transition-speed: 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        /* Base Styles */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }

        body {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            color: var(--text-dark);
            line-height: 1.6;
            background-color: var(--light);
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 1.5rem;
        }

        a {
            text-decoration: none;
            color: var(--primary);
            transition: color var(--transition-speed);
        }

        a:hover {
            color: var(--secondary);
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            color: var(--dark);
            line-height: 1.2;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        h1 { font-size: 3.5rem; } /* Desktop */
        h2 { font-size: 2.8rem; }
        h3 { font-size: 2.2rem; }
        h4 { font-size: 1.8rem; }
        p { margin-bottom: 1rem; }

        /* Buttons */
        .btn {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 0.9rem 2rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-sm);
            font-weight: 600;
            text-align: center;
            white-space: nowrap;
            cursor: pointer;
            border: none;
            transition: all var(--transition-speed);
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-size: 1rem;
        }

        .btn-primary {
            background: var(--gradient);
            color: var(--text-light);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3);
        }

        .btn-primary:hover {
            background: var(--gradient-hover);
            box-shadow: 0 12px 35px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.4);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background-color: transparent;
            color: var(--primary);
            border: 2px solid var(--primary);
            padding: 0.7rem 1.8rem;
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background-color: var(--primary);
            color: var(--text-light);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        /* Section Styling */
        section {
            padding: 6rem 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .section-heading {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 4rem;
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--dark);
        }

        .section-subheading {
            text-align: center;
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: -3rem auto 4rem auto;
            color: #555;
            font-size: 1.15rem;
        }

        /* Navbar */
        .navbar {
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1000;
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); /* Semi-transparent background */
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px); /* Glassmorphism effect */
            padding: 1rem 0;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
            transition: background-color var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .navbar-container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .logo {
            font-family: var(--font-heading);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--dark);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .logo i {
            margin-right: 0.5rem;
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 2rem;
        }

        .nav-links {
            list-style: none;
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
        }

        .nav-links a {
            color: var(--dark);
            font-weight: 600;
            padding: 0.5rem 0;
            position: relative;
        }

        .nav-links a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 3px;
            background: var(--gradient);
            transition: width var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .nav-links a:hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .nav-toggle {
            display: none;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            color: var(--dark);
            cursor: pointer;
            background: none;
            border: none;
        }

        /* Hero Section */
        .hero {
            height: 100vh;
            background-image: url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522071820081-009f0129c71c?w=1920&h=1080&fit=crop'); /* Team working */
            background-size: cover;
            background-position: center;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            color: var(--text-light);
        }

        .hero::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(30, 27, 75, 0.7) 0%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.6) 100%); /* Dark overlay with gradient */
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            max-width: 900px;
            padding: 2rem;
            animation: fadeIn 1.5s ease-out forwards;
        }

        .hero-content h1 {
            font-size: 4.5rem; /* Large hero text */
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--text-light);
            text-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
        }

        .hero-content p {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
            color: var(--light);
            max-width: 700px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }

        .hero-buttons {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 1.5rem;
        }

        /* Services Section */
        .services-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
            margin-top: 3rem;
        }

        .service-card {
            background-color: #fff;
            padding: 2.5rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            text-align: center;
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            border: 1px solid rgba(var(--primary), 0.05);
        }

        .service-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 5px;
            background: var(--gradient);
            transform: translateY(-100%);
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .service-card:hover::before {
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .service-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 70px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        }

        .service-card .icon {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            color: var(--primary);
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            background: var(--light);
            border-radius: 50%;
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.2);
        }
        
        .service-card .service-img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 200px;
            object-fit: cover;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-sm);
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }

        .service-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: var(--dark);
        }

        .service-card p {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: #666;
        }

        /* About Section */
        .about-content {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 4rem;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .about-text h2 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .about-text p {
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            color: #444;
        }

        .about-image {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 1rem;
            background-color: #fff;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
        }
        
        .about-image img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
            display: block;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        .about-image:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: 0 30px 80px rgba(0,0,0,0.25), 0 15px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }

        /* Testimonials Section */
        .testimonials {
            background-color: var(--primary);
            color: var(--text-light);
            padding: 8rem 0;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            background-image: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--dark) 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
        }

        .testimonials::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50px;
            left: -50px;
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
            border-radius: 50%;
            transform: rotate(45deg);
        }

        .testimonials::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -50px;
            right: -50px;
            width: 250px;
            height: 250px;
            background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
            border-radius: 50%;
            transform: rotate(-30deg);
        }

        .testimonials .section-heading {
            color: var(--text-light);
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        .testimonials .section-subheading {
            color: var(--light);
            margin-bottom: 4rem;
        }

        .testimonial-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 2rem;
        }

        .testimonial-card {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); /* Glassmorphism background */
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            padding: 2.5rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-md);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-light);
            color: var(--text-light);
            text-align: center;
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        }

        .testimonial-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-8px);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        }

        .testimonial-card img {
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            border: 4px solid var(--accent);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 6px rgba(255,255,255,0.1), 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        }

        .testimonial-card p {
            font-style: italic;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            line-height: 1.8;
            color: var(--light);
        }

        .testimonial-card .client-name {
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 0.2rem;
        }

        .testimonial-card .client-title {

        }

        /* Contact Section */
        .contact-content {

            gap: 4rem;

        }

        .contact-info h2 {

            font-weight: 800;

            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            color: #444;
        }

        .contact-details ul {
            list-style: none;
        }

        .contact-details li {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            color: #333;
        }

        .contact-details li i {
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            margin-right: 1rem;
            width: 30px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .contact-form {
            background-color: #fff;
            padding: 3rem;
            border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-premium);
            transition: transform var(--transition-speed), box-shadow var(--transition-speed);
        }

        .contact-form:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 25px 70px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        }

        .contact-form .form-group {
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        .contact-form label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 0.6rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--dark);
            font-size: 1rem;
        }

        .contact-form input[type="text"],
        .contact-form input[type="email"],

            width: 100%;
            padding: 1rem 1.2rem;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            const navToggle = document.querySelector('.nav-toggle');
            const navLinks = document.querySelector('.nav-links');

            navToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
                navLinks.classList.toggle('active');
                const icon = navToggle.querySelector('i');
                if (navLinks.classList.contains('active')) {
                    icon.classList.remove('fa-bars');
                    icon.classList.add('fa-times');
                } else {
                    icon.classList.remove('fa-times');
                    icon.classList.add('fa-bars');
                }
            });

            // Close mobile menu when a link is clicked
            document.querySelectorAll('.nav-links a').forEach(link => {
                link.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    if (navLinks.classList.contains('active')) {
                        navLinks.classList.remove('active');
                        const icon = navToggle.querySelector('i');
                        icon.classList.remove('fa-times');
                        icon.classList.add('fa-bars');
                    }
                });
            });

            // Smooth scroll for internal links
            document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
                anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                    e.preventDefault();

                    document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')).scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth'
                    });
                });
            });

            // Optional: Add scroll animation for sections
            const observerOptions = {
                root: null,
                rootMargin: '0px',
                threshold: 0.1
            };

            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        entry.target.style.opacity = '1';
                        entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                    } else {
                        // Optional: Reset for re-animation on scroll back up
                        // entry.target.style.opacity = '0';
                        // entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(50px)';
                    }
                });
            }, observerOptions);

            document.querySelectorAll('section:not(#hero)').forEach(section => {
                section.style.opacity = '0';
                section.style.transform = 'translateY(50px)';
                section.style.transition = 'opacity 0.8s ease-out, transform 0.8s ease-out';
                observer.observe(section);
            });
        });
    </script>

<script>
(function() {
  const fallbackImages = ["1522071820080-37f2cb85c41d","1497366216548-37526070297c","1556761175-4bda37b9dd37","1556761175-b4136fa58510","1552664736-d46ed1db83d9","1556761175-5973dc0f32e7","1556761175-5973dc0f32e8","1556761175-5973dc0f32e9","1556761175-5973dc0f32ea","1556761175-5973dc0f32eb"];
  let fallbackIndex = 0;
  
  function getFallbackImageUrl() {
    if (fallbackIndex >= fallbackImages.length) {
      fallbackIndex = 0;
    }
    const imageId = fallbackImages[fallbackIndex];
    fallbackIndex++;
    return 'https://images.unsplash.com/' + imageId + '?w=800&h=600&fit=crop';
  }
  
  function handleImageError(img) {
    const originalSrc = img.getAttribute('data-original-src') || img.src;
    
    if (!img.getAttribute('data-original-src')) {
      img.setAttribute('data-original-src', originalSrc);
      img.setAttribute('data-fallback-attempts', '0');
    }
    
    const attempts = parseInt(img.getAttribute('data-fallback-attempts') || '0');
    
    if (attempts < 5) {
      img.setAttribute('data-fallback-attempts', (attempts + 1).toString());
      img.src = getFallbackImageUrl();
    } else {
      img.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
  
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const images = document.querySelectorAll('img');
    images.forEach(function(img) {
      if (!img.onerror) {
        img.onerror = function() { handleImageError(img); };
      }
    });
  });
  
  const observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
    mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {
      mutation.addedNodes.forEach(function(node) {
        if (node.nodeType === 1) {
          if (node.tagName === 'IMG') {
            node.onerror = function() { handleImageError(node); };
          }
          const images = node.querySelectorAll && node.querySelectorAll('img');
          if (images) {
            images.forEach(function(img) {
              if (!img.onerror) {
                img.onerror = function() { handleImageError(img); };
              }
            });
          }
        }
      });
    });
  });
  
  observer.observe(document.body || document.documentElement, {
    childList: true,
    subtree: true
  });
})();
</script></body>
</html>

A Founder's Best Friend

Our Process

Corazón de Agave
  • Inicio
  • Servicios
  • Nuestra Historia
  • Testimonios
  • Reservar
Reservar Mesa

El Alma de México en Cada Bocado

Descubre la auténtica cocina mexicana, preparada con pasión y los ingredientes más frescos de la región. Una experiencia culinaria que te transportará directamente al corazón de México.

Ver Nuestro Menú Hacer una Reserva

¿Por Qué Elegirnos?

Ingredientes de Origen

Seleccionamos los mejores productos locales para garantizar frescura y calidad en cada platillo.

Recetas de Familia

Nuestra cocina se basa en recetas tradicionales pasadas de generación en generación, con un toque moderno.

Ambiente Inolvidable

Un espacio diseñado para que te sientas como en casa, vibrante y acogedor, perfecto para cualquier ocasión.

NUESTRA HISTORIA

Pasión por la Tradición

Corazón de Agave nació del sueño de la familia Rojas de compartir el auténtico sabor de su tierra natal. Desde nuestra apertura, hemos fusionado las recetas de la abuela con técnicas culinarias contemporáneas para crear una experiencia única.

Nuestro espacio está diseñado para ser más que un restaurante; es un punto de encuentro para celebrar la vida, la amistad y la rica cultura mexicana. Cada detalle, desde la decoración hasta la música, está pensado para transportarte.

Conoce Más

Lo Que Dicen Nuestros Clientes

"¡La mejor comida mexicana que he probado fuera de México! El ambiente es increíble y el servicio de primera. Los tacos al pastor son una obra de arte."

Ana Pérez Visitante Frecuente

"Un lugar perfecto para una cena especial. Cuidan cada detalle y los sabores son espectaculares. La coctelería con mezcal es simplemente sublime."

Carlos Gómez Crítico Gastronómico

"El ambiente te transporta. Es el sitio ideal para una reunión de negocios o una cena romántica. ¡Totalmente recomendado! Volveré una y otra vez."

Sofía Rodríguez Empresaria

¿Listo para una Experiencia Única?

Haz tu reserva hoy y déjanos transportarte al corazón de México con nuestros sabores auténticos y nuestro ambiente vibrante.

Reservar Ahora

Phase 1: Discovery

We perform a deep-dive analysis of your business, identifying key leverage points and hidden obstacles with our AI diagnostic tools.

Phase 2: Acceleration

Receive 1-on-1 mentorship from industry titans. We implement proven strategies for scaling, fundraising, and product development.

Phase 3: Ascendance

Dominate your market. We provide ongoing strategic support to ensure long-term success and help you build a lasting legacy.

Are You Ready to Ascend?

We partner with visionary founders who are obsessed with building the future. This is for you if:

  • You're a funded startup founder aiming for category leadership.
  • You're an ambitious entrepreneur ready to scale your proven business model.
  • You're seeking elite mentorship to avoid critical mistakes and accelerate growth.
  • You believe in leveraging AI to gain an unfair competitive advantage.

Meet Your Mentors

Learn from the best. Our mentors are serial entrepreneurs, unicorn founders, and top-tier VCs who have been in your shoes.

Johnathan Chen

Founder, QuantumLeap AI

Sarah Rodriguez

Ex-VP of Growth, Nova Corp

Michael Bennett

Partner, Apex Ventures

Emily Sato

Founder & CEO, ConnectSphere

Success Stories

Don't just take our word for it. Hear from founders who have transformed their businesses with Ascendance Foundry.

"The mentorship was a game-changer. We closed our Series A within 6 months of joining the program. The insights from people who have built billion-dollar companies are simply invaluable."

Alex Carter CEO, FinTech Innovators

Frequently Asked Questions

Have questions? We have answers. Here are some of the most common things founders ask us.

What is the duration of the program?

Our core program is an intensive 6-month engagement. However, we believe in building long-term partnerships. Many of our founders continue to work with their mentors and our network long after the initial program concludes.

What stage of company is the best fit?

We typically work with companies that have achieved product-market fit and are generating early revenue ($500k - $5M ARR). The ideal candidate is a founder who is ready to scale aggressively and is facing challenges related to growth, team-building, or fundraising.

How are mentors selected for me?

Mentor matching is a highly personalized process. Based on our initial AI-powered diagnostic and deep-dive sessions, we identify your most critical needs and match you with 2-3 mentors from our network who have specific, relevant experience in those areas.

Is there an equity component?

Yes, we operate on a hybrid model that includes a program fee and a small equity stake. We believe this aligns our incentives completely with your success. We only win when you win, and our goal is to provide a 100x return on your investment in us.

Ready to Build a Legendary Company?

Applications are now open for our next cohort. We accept less than 1% of applicants. If you believe you have what it takes, we want to hear from you.

Apply to the Foundry

Elite Mentors. Exponential Growth. AI First.

We connect ambitious professionals with world-class mentors from top tech companies. Unlock your potential with personalized guidance and an AI-powered matching platform.

Book a Discovery Call See Our Mentors

TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS FROM

Google Meta Amazon Netflix Apple
THE PROBLEM

Unlock Your Potential. Bridge The Gap.

The gap between your current abilities and your ultimate potential is vast. Navigating it alone is slow and inefficient. Generic advice falls short. You need tailored guidance from someone who has already walked the path.

Mentorship accelerates your growth, closing the gap to your full potential faster than any other method.

HOW IT WORKS

Your Journey to Exponential Growth in 3 Steps

Our streamlined process ensures you're matched with the perfect mentor to help you achieve your specific goals.

01

AI-Powered Matching

Our proprietary AI analyzes your profile, goals, and challenges to find the ideal mentor from our elite network.

02

1-on-1 Sessions

Engage in deep, personalized sessions focused on your specific needs, from career strategy to technical skills.

03

Continuous Growth

Receive actionable feedback, track your progress, and leverage our resources to ensure continuous development.

ELITE MENTORS

Learn from the Best in the Industry

Our mentors are vetted leaders, founders, and experts from the world's most innovative companies.

Jane Doe

Senior Product Manager

Google

John Smith

Lead AI Researcher

OpenAI

Emily White

VP of Engineering

Netflix

Michael Brown

Founder & CEO

Unicorn Startup

WHAT YOU GET

A Comprehensive Growth Platform

We provide more than just meetings. We provide a complete ecosystem for your professional development.

  • Personalized 1-on-1 Mentorship Sessions
  • AI-Powered Mentor Matching System
  • Customized Growth & Development Plan
  • Access to an Exclusive Community Network
  • Curated Library of Resources & Workshops
  • Direct Messaging with Your Mentor
  • Performance Tracking & Goal Setting Tools
  • Priority Access to Industry Events
FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Have questions? We've got answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.

Our mentors are highly accomplished professionals, including founders, executives, and senior experts from leading tech companies like Google, Meta, Amazon, and successful startups. Each mentor undergoes a rigorous vetting process to ensure they possess both deep industry expertise and a passion for mentorship.

Our AI algorithm analyzes dozens of data points from your profile, including your industry, role, career goals, challenges, and communication style. It then cross-references this with our mentor database to find the best possible matches based on expertise, experience, and personality fit, ensuring a highly effective mentorship relationship.

The program is flexible to fit your schedule. Typically, members have one or two 60-minute sessions with their mentor per month. Outside of sessions, you can communicate via direct messaging. We recommend dedicating 2-3 hours per week to fully leverage the mentorship and associated resources.

Progress is measured against the personalized growth plan you create with your mentor at the beginning of the program. Our platform includes goal-setting and progress-tracking tools. You'll have regular check-ins with your mentor to review achievements, tackle new challenges, and adjust your strategy as needed.

Ready to Accelerate Your Growth?

Stop guessing and start growing with guidance from the best in the business.
Book your free, no-obligation discovery call today.

Book a Discovery Call

Your Reliable Ride in Toronto.

Fast, safe, and professional taxi service, available 24/7. Get where you need to go with Beck Taxi.

Book a Ride Now

Why Choose Beck Taxi?

We are dedicated to providing the best taxi experience in the Greater Toronto Area.

24/7 Availability

Always ready, day or night. We're here whenever you need a ride, including holidays and weekends.

Professional Drivers

Our drivers are licensed, background-checked, and committed to your safety and comfort.

Easy Booking

Book a taxi in seconds through our user-friendly mobile app, website, or by calling our dispatch.

Airport Transfers

Reliable and timely service to and from Toronto Pearson (YYZ) and Billy Bishop (YTZ) airports.

Your Trusted Partner on the Road

Serving Toronto for Over 50 Years

Beck Taxi has been a cornerstone of Toronto's transportation network for decades. Founded on the principles of reliability, safety, and customer satisfaction, we have grown to become one of the city's most recognized and trusted taxi services.

We are proud to be a part of the Toronto community, connecting people and places with our fleet of clean, well-maintained vehicles and our team of professional drivers. Our commitment to technology ensures a seamless booking experience, while our deep knowledge of the city guarantees an efficient ride.

What Our Customers Say

Real feedback from satisfied riders across the city.

Beck Taxi has been my go-to for airport runs for years. They are always on time, the cars are clean, and the drivers are professional and know the best routes to avoid traffic.

Sarah L.

I used the app to book a last-minute ride downtown. It was incredibly easy to use, and my driver, Ahmed, arrived in less than 5 minutes. Fantastic service!

Mark D.

As a senior, I appreciate the respectful and helpful drivers at Beck. They always assist me with my groceries and ensure I get to my door safely. I feel very secure riding with them.

Evelyn R.

Get in Touch

Have a question or need to book a ride? We're here to help.

Contact Information

For immediate bookings, please call us or use our mobile app. For other inquiries, feel free to reach out.

Home Our Team Careers Contact Apply Now
Home Our Team Careers Contact Apply Now

Talent And AI Training, Built Into Your Team

Fellowships pair a top student with your employee for AI training, mentorship, and project delivery.

Apply Now Work With Us

What is Ascendance Foundry?

We pair high-potential university students with your employees for 1-on-1 mentorship. Your team members gain leadership experience and AI training, while our fellows get real-world experience. It's a win-win that drives innovation and growth.

Learn More →

"Ascendance has been a game-changer for our junior talent development. The structure, the quality of the fellows, and the AI focus are unparalleled."

Ian C., Engineering Manager

Fortune 500 Tech Company

How It Works

A streamlined process to integrate top talent and AI skills into your workflow.

1. Project Scoping

We work with you to define a meaningful 12-week project. This ensures fellows contribute to real business goals while learning from your team.

2. Fellow Matching

Our rigorous vetting process selects the top 1% of student talent. We match you with a fellow whose skills and ambitions align with your project needs.

3. Execution & Growth

Fellows and mentors receive ongoing AI training and support. They execute the project, delivering tangible results and fostering a culture of innovation.

Benefits for Your Business

  • Cost-Effective Talent: Access top-tier, pre-vetted talent for specific projects without the overhead of a full-time hire.
  • AI Upskilling: Your mentors receive cutting-edge AI training, keeping your team ahead of the curve.
  • Leadership Development: Empower your employees to grow as leaders by mentoring the next generation of innovators.
  • Stronger Talent Pipeline: Build relationships with exceptional students, creating a direct pipeline for future recruitment.

Fellowship Tracks

We offer specialized tracks to meet your specific business needs.

AI Engineering

Develop and deploy machine learning models, build AI-powered applications, and work with large language models (LLMs).

Data Science & Analytics

Extract insights from complex datasets, build predictive models, and create data visualizations to drive business decisions.

Product Management

Define product strategy, conduct user research, and work with engineering teams to launch innovative AI features.

Growth & Marketing

Leverage data and AI tools to optimize marketing campaigns, analyze user behavior, and drive business growth.

Ready to find your next top performer?

Join leading companies in building the future of talent. Apply to become a fellow or partner with us to host a fellowship.

Apply to be a Fellow

We're an AI-first talent accelerator, connecting elite students with innovative companies for mentorship and exponential growth.

  • Contact

Legal

  • San Francisco, CA

websiteContent.index.html:
Ahmed Jaffar

Software Engineer

I build exceptional and accessible digital experiences for the web.

  • GitHub
  • LinkedIn
  • Email

About

Back in 2018, I decided to try my hand at creating a Valorant stats website and tumbled head first into the rabbit hole of coding and web development. Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had the privilege of building software for a huge corporation, and a telecom company.

My main focus these days is building products and features for our clients at Sun Life. I most enjoy building software in the sweet spot where design and engineering meet — things that look good but are also built well under the hood. In my free time, I've also released an app to the App Store, and have been learning more about React Native.

When I’m not at the computer, I’m usually hanging out with my friends and family, playing video games, or lifting weights at the gym.

Experience

  1. 2022 — PRESENT

    Software Engineer · Sun Life

    Deliver high-quality, robust production code for a diverse array of projects for clients including Scotiabank, National Bank of Canada, and Manulife. Provide leadership within engineering department through close collaboration, knowledge shares, and mentorship.

    • Angular
    • TypeScript
    • JavaScript
    • SCSS
    • Jasmine
  2. 2021 — 2022

    Software Developer · Bell

    Developed and styled interactive web applications for a diverse group of clients ranging from startups to government organizations. Collaborated with a team of developers to ship new features and improve the user experience of our products.

    • React
    • JavaScript
    • HTML
    • CSS
View Full Résumé

Projects

  • Valorant Inventory Manager

    Web application that allows users to manage their Valorant skin inventory. Users can log in with their Riot Games account and view their collection, as well as create and share their own custom skin loadouts.

  • TFT Meta

    A web application that allows users to view the current meta for the popular auto-battler game, Teamfight Tactics. Users can view the top compositions, as well as the best items for each champion.

    • React
    • Next.js
    • TypeScript
    • Tailwind CSS

"use client"

import * as React from "react"
import * as LabelPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-label"
import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const labelVariants = cva(
  "text-sm font-medium leading-none peer-disabled:cursor-not-allowed peer-disabled:opacity-70"
)

const Label = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root> & VariantProps<typeof labelVariants>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
  <LabelPrimitive.Root ref={ref} className={cn(labelVariants(), className)} {...props} />
))
Label.displayName = LabelPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Label }

Nuestra Historia

From Abuela's Kitchen to Your Table

Sabor Mexicana is more than a restaurant; it's the culmination of a lifelong dream. It began with our grandmother, Elena, whose kitchen was the heart of our family. Her recipes, passed down through generations, were a celebration of life, love, and the rich culinary heritage of Jalisco.

We opened our doors to share that same warmth and authentic flavor with our community, creating a place where every meal feels like a family gathering.

Tradition

Honoring the authentic recipes and cooking techniques that define Mexican cuisine.

Quality

Sourcing the freshest local ingredients to ensure every dish is vibrant and flavorful.

Community

Creating a welcoming space where friends and family can connect over a great meal.

websiteContent.about.html:
Sabor Auténtico
Home About Us Menu Reservations Contact
Book a Table

Generations of Flavor, Poured into Every Dish.

Sabor Auténtico was born from a simple dream: to share the vibrant, soulful cooking of our family with our new community. We are more than a restaurant; we are storytellers, and our medium is food.

Our Mission

To share the authentic taste of our family's heritage, creating a memorable dining experience that feels like coming home.

Our Vision

To be the city's most beloved destination for genuine Mexican cuisine, celebrated for our quality, hospitality, and vibrant atmosphere.

Our Values

Tradition in our recipes, Quality in our ingredients, and warm Hospitality in our service. These are the pillars of our restaurant.

Our Journey

A story that started with a single recipe book and a lot of heart.

1978 - The Beginning

Grandma Elena opens her first small taqueria in Jalisco, Mexico, winning hearts with her secret carnitas recipe.

2005 - A Legacy Passed Down

The cherished family recipe book, filled with notes and secrets, is passed down to the next generation.

2018 - A New Home

Bringing the flavors of home to a new city, the family opens the doors to the first Sabor Auténtico.

2023 - Community Acclaim

Brand Strategy & Identity

We partner with a diverse range of clients, from ambitious startups to established enterprise companies across various industries. Our ideal partner is one who values creativity, strategy, and is ready to make a bold move in their market.

Success is defined by the goals we set together at the project's outset. We track key performance indicators (KPIs) such as website traffic, conversion rates, user engagement, and lead generation. We provide regular, detailed reports to show the tangible impact of our work.

Artisan Pizza, Fired with Passion.

The Slice & Spice Difference

More Than Just a Meal

We pour our hearts into every detail, from the dough to your dining experience.

Authentic Ingredients

We source San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and local produce to create flavors that transport you to Italy.

Wood-Fired Perfection

Our custom-built oven reaches 900°F, charring the crust to perfection in under 90 seconds for an unmatched taste and texture.

Cozy Ambiance

From romantic dinners to family gatherings, our warm and inviting atmosphere makes every occasion special.

Our Story

From a Family Kitchen to Your Table

Slice & Spice began with Nonna's secret dough recipe and a dream to share our family's passion for authentic Italian pizza. For over a decade, we've been a cornerstone of the community, serving memories one slice at a time.

Every pizza we make is a tribute to our heritage and a celebration of good food shared with good company.

Book a Table
Our Heritage

Crafted with Love, Served with Pride.

Our story isn't just about pizza; it's about family, tradition, and the simple joy of sharing a meal. It began in a small kitchen in Southern Italy and continues today at your table.

Our Mission

To be the heart of our community by serving exceptional, authentic pizza that brings people together and creates lasting memories.

Our Vision

To be recognized as the benchmark for artisan pizza, celebrated for our commitment to quality, tradition, and warm hospitality.

Our Values

Quality in every ingredient, Passion in every pizza, and Community in every interaction. These are the pillars of Slice & Spice.

Our Journey

A timeline of passion, perseverance, and pizza.

2009: The Dream Begins

Founder Marco Giuliani brings his Nonna's secret dough recipe from Naples to America, dreaming of opening his own pizzeria.

2012: First Oven Fired

Slice & Spice opens its doors in a small, cozy location, quickly becoming a local favorite for its authentic taste.

2023: Voted "Best Pizza"

Awarded "Best Pizza in the City" by Foodie Magazine, a testament to our unwavering commitment to quality.
