We believe in conscious beauty.

Aura is more than just skincare; it's a philosophy. We're dedicated to creating products that are kind to your skin, kind to animals, and kind to the planet.

Our Mission

To empower individuals through mindful self-care rituals with clean, effective, and ethically-produced skincare.

Our Vision

To be a global leader in sustainable beauty, inspiring a community that values transparency, wellness, and environmental stewardship.

Our Values

Purity, Integrity, Kindness, and Sustainability are the pillars that support every decision we make at Aura.

Our Journey So Far

From a humble beginning to a thriving community.

2020 - The Spark

Founder, Maya Chen, begins experimenting with botanical blends in her home kitchen, searching for a solution to her own sensitive skin.

2021 - Aura is Born

After a year of formulation, Aura launches online with three core products: the Radiance Serum, Cleansing Balm, and Hydrating Mist.

2023 - Certified Cruelty-Free

Aura proudly receives Leaping Bunny certification, solidifying our commitment to animal welfare.

2024 - 50,000 Strong

Our community grows to over 50,000 happy customers worldwide, and we expand our line with five new, innovative products.

Meet the Innovators

We're a small, passionate team of botanists, chemists, and skincare enthusiasts dedicated to the Aura mission.

Frequently Asked Questions

Have questions? We have answers.

Are your products suitable for sensitive skin?

Yes! All our products are dermatologist-tested and formulated to be gentle. We avoid common irritants like synthetic fragrances, parabens, and sulfates. We always recommend patch testing a new product before use.

Is Aura cruelty-free and vegan?

Absolutely. We are Leaping Bunny certified, which means none of our products or ingredients are ever tested on animals. All of our products are 100% vegan, containing no animal-derived ingredients.

What is your return policy?

We offer a 30-day happiness guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return it for a full refund or exchange. Please visit our Shipping & Returns page for more details.

How does the subscription work?

Our "Glow Up Kit" subscription delivers your favorite products to your door every month. You save 20% on every shipment, get free shipping, and can easily manage, pause, or cancel your subscription anytime from your account dashboard.

Our Process

Get Started in 3 Easy Steps

1

Choose Your Plan

Select the plan that best fits your business needs and goals.

2

Customize Your Store

Use our intuitive builder to design a stunning storefront that reflects your brand.

3

Launch & Grow

Go live and start selling! Use our powerful tools to grow your business.

Frequently Asked Questions

Have questions? We've got answers.

Can I switch plans later? +

Absolutely! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time directly from your account dashboard. We believe in flexibility for your growing business.

Are there any transaction fees? +

Stellar does not charge any transaction fees. You will only be subject to the standard processing fees from our payment partner, Stripe.

Can I use my own domain name? +

Yes, you can easily connect your own custom domain name to your Stellar store. We also provide a free `yourstore.stellar.com` domain to get you started.

What kind of support do you offer? +

We offer 24/7 email support for all plans. Our Pro and Enterprise plans include priority support and dedicated account management to ensure you have everything you need to succeed.

Choose Your Plan

Frequently Asked Questions

Have questions? We've got answers.

Can I switch plans later? +

Absolutely! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time directly from your account dashboard. We believe in flexibility for your growing business.

Are there any transaction fees? +

Stellar does not charge any transaction fees. You will only be subject to the standard processing fees from our payment partner, Stripe.

Can I use my own domain name? +

Yes, you can easily connect your own custom domain name to your Stellar store. We also provide a free `yourstore.stellar.com` domain to get you started.

What kind of support do you offer? +

We offer 24/7 email support for all plans. Our Pro and Enterprise plans include priority support and dedicated account management to ensure you have everything you need to succeed.

websiteContent.about.html:
Gintama
Home The Story The Arcs Community
Explore Arcs
The Setting

Welcome to Kabuki District, Edo.

In an alternate-history late-Edo period, humanity is attacked by aliens called "Amanto." The samurai of Japan fought to defend Earth, but the shōgun cowardly surrendered. Now, swords are banned and the samurai are treated with disregard. The story follows an eccentric samurai, Gintoki Sakata, who works as a freelancer alongside his friends Shinpachi Shimura and Kagura in order to pay the monthly rent.

The Soul of the Samurai

Beyond the gags and parodies lies a story with profound themes.

Found Family

The core of Gintama is the unbreakable bonds between misfits who find a home in each other, proving family isn't just about blood.

Living Your Own Bushido

In an era where the samurai code is dead, Gintoki and his friends forge their own path, protecting what's truly important to them.

Laughing Through Hardship

Gintama teaches that even in the darkest times, humor and absurdity can be a source of strength and resilience.

The Main Cast

The heart and soul of the Yorozuya.

Gintoki Sakata

The Shiroyasha / Sugar Fiend

Shinpachi Shimura

The Straight Man / Otaku

Kagura

Yato Clan Alien /酢昆布Lover

Sadaharu

Inugami / Mascot

A Legendary Journey

The history of a modern classic.

December 8, 2003

Manga Serialization Begins

Hideaki Sorachi's Gintama debuts in Weekly Shōnen Jump, changing the landscape of comedy manga forever.

April 4, 2006

Anime Premieres

The first episode airs on TV Tokyo, bringing the chaotic world of Gintama to life with its iconic voice cast.

January 8, 2021

Gintama: The Final

The "final" movie is released, adapting the last chapters of the manga and providing a spectacular (but maybe not final?) conclusion.

Ready for the Next Chapter?

The story is vast and full of unforgettable moments. Discover the legendary arcs that define the Gintama experience.

websiteContent.services.html:
Gintama
Home The Story The Arcs Community
Watch Guide

From Gag-a-Day to Galactic War.

Gintama's story is told through a series of arcs that range from hilarious single-episode adventures to epic, multi-part sagas that will change the way you see the series. Here are some of the most iconic.

ACTION / DRAMA

Benizakura Arc

The first major serious arc. A cursed sword, a missing friend, and Gintoki's past collide in a battle that sets the stage for everything to come.

ACTION / FANTASY

Yoshiwara in Flames Arc

The Yorozuya travel to Yoshiwara, the red-light district in the sky, and find themselves in a war against the King of the Night, Hosen.

COMEDY / SLICE OF LIFE

Shogun Arc (Comedy)

Any arc featuring the Shogun is guaranteed chaos. From swimming pools to barbershops, witness the Shogun's tragic-comic adventures.

TRAGEDY / ACTION

Shogun Assassination Arc

The turning point. Gintama's comedy fades as a plot to assassinate the Shogun ignites an all-out war, revealing Gintoki's darkest secrets.

DRAMA / ACTION

Farewell, Shinsengumi Arc

Directly following the SA arc, the Shinsengumi face their ultimate crisis. A heartbreaking and epic conclusion for Edo's beloved police force.

WAR / SCI-FI

Silver Soul Arc

The final, massive arc of the series. All the characters Gintama has built up over hundreds of episodes unite to defend Earth from its ultimate threat.

How to Watch Gintama

It's a long journey, but a rewarding one. Choose your path.

The Casual

Just the Hits

Want the best of both worlds? Watch the first 50 episodes to meet the cast, then jump between top-rated comedy episodes and the major serious arcs.

View Arc List
Recommended

The Purist

The Full Experience

The definitive way. Watch everything in chronological order (anime seasons + movies). You'll appreciate the serious arcs more after spending hundreds of episodes laughing with the characters.

Full Watch Order

The Scholar

The Source Material

Go back to where it all began. Read Hideaki Sorachi's original manga from start to finish to experience the story exactly as the "Gorilla" mangaka intended.

Read on VIZ

Frequently Asked Questions

Do I have to start from Episode 1?

Episodes 1 and 2 are anime-original filler to celebrate the manga getting an anime. It's recommended to start from Episode 3, which is the actual beginning of the story.

Is it really all comedy?

No! While Gintama is primarily a comedy, it's famous for its "bait-and-switch." The serious arcs are some of the most intense and emotional in all of shonen anime, dealing with themes of war, loss, and rebellion.

What's with all the 4th wall breaks and parodies?

It's the show's signature style! The characters are fully aware they are in an anime, and they constantly make fun of shonen tropes, other anime series, and even their own production staff. It's part of the charm.

When does it "get good"?

A common question. While many fans love it from the start, the first major serious arc (Benizakura) starts around episode 58. This is often cited as the point where the series shows its true potential.

Gintama

An unofficial fan tribute to the greatest story of samurai, aliens, and odd jobs in the universe.

Apply Now
Home Our Team Careers Contact Apply Now

Talent And AI Training, Built Into Your Team

Fellowships pair a top student with your employee for AI training, mentorship, and project delivery.

Apply Now Work With Us

What is Ascendance Foundry?

We are an AI-first talent and training partner. We embed top university students into your company as fellows. Each fellow is paired with one of your employees for a 12-week project-based fellowship. Your employee gets AI training and mentorship experience, while the fellow delivers a real project for your team.

Learn More →
"We're building the next generation of AI leaders."

Ian, Founder

How it Works

1

Apply

Students from top universities apply to our highly selective fellowship program. Companies apply to host fellows.

2

Match

We match your company with the best-fit fellow based on your project needs and their skills and interests.

3

Grow

Fellows and employees grow together through mentorship, training, and hands-on project experience.

Our Program

We offer two fellowship tracks designed to build critical AI capabilities within your team.

AI Engineering

For teams looking to build and deploy AI-powered products. Fellows work on projects involving machine learning models, data pipelines, and AI application development.

Key Skills:

  • Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow
  • Natural Language Processing (NLP)
  • Computer Vision
  • Cloud AI Services (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Learn More →

AI Business Strategy

For teams aiming to integrate AI into their business strategy. Fellows work on market analysis, AI product management, and developing AI use cases.

Key Skills:

  • AI Product Roadmapping
  • Market & Competitive Analysis
  • Data-driven Decision Making
  • Go-to-Market Strategy for AI
Learn More →

Why Ascendance?

We provide a unique model that benefits both your company and the next generation of talent.

Elite Mentorship

Your employees gain valuable leadership and mentorship skills by guiding a high-potential fellow.

Exponential Growth

Accelerate your AI initiatives with dedicated talent focused on delivering impactful projects.

AI First

Our curriculum and projects are designed to build practical, cutting-edge AI skills.

Meet Our Fellows

Our fellows are exceptional students from top universities, passionate about building the future with AI.

Alex Johnson

Stanford University

Maria Garcia

MIT

David Chen

UC Berkeley

Sarah Lee

Carnegie Mellon

Ready to build the future?

Apply Now Partner With Us

Elite Mentors. Exponential Growth. AI First.

  • Careers
  • Contact

  • Terms of Service
